story:
It's been a month since little Theodore came and left this world, here's a poem shared by his brave Mommy Amanda.

"4 weeks ago today have passed since we lost our little boy ♥ I miss him so much every day, our precious little boy ♥
Holding out these empty arms
Cursing my disillusionment 
Why did I imagine it could be any other way
that I could have been content, dreams that’s all it was,

Mothers arms are not meant to be empty
I look up at the sky, tears filling my eyes,
Searching the stars trying to find my angel
The brightest star I search for 
Finding it the first tear rolls down my cheek
Memories flood back of our short time together
Love totally encasing my heart as I look at that star
I know you are there baby I will never forget
I just can’t come to accept as I look that you are so far
I would have cuddled and loved you kept you safe
Within my arms holding you in a tight embrace
I will search these skies for you each night
But just for now have to leave you in Gods guiding light
Sleep well my baby one day my arms and heart will be full again
As I join you and give you all that was meant to be"
 
http://www.familyfriendpoems.com/poem/death-of-...
 
 
November 2012 

Imagine having to say goodbye to your unborn child, planning the birth knowing there was no chance of survival, no parent can.  It's deeply saddening to know that some parents must face such an unimaginable inevitability.  This is the story of heroic little Theodore and his Mommies Amanda Leliever and Jacqueline Peters of Orangeville, Ontario.  Please take a moment to read their journey, and perhaps show some support to two young parents who desperately need it.

 

On Tuesday October 30, 2012 Amanda and Jacquie went in for their 20 week ultrasound when they noticed some abnormalities in the baby.  After some more detailed testing was done it was determined that the baby had Trisomy 13. also called Patau syndrome, it is a chromosomal condition associated with severe intellectual disability and physical abnormalities in many parts of the body.  What Amanda and Jacquie were told was that Theodore's head is very long, there is no pronounced face, possibly a major cleft in the mouth because they cannot decipher lips or nose. There are eye sockets but no eyes, there may only be one if anything at all. Most of the brian is missing, the main component to breathe is not there, only a brain stem. There is a heart beating nice and strong but missing some valves. And the kidneys are not functioning. There are supposed to be 2 arteries and 1 vein in the umbilical cord but there is only 1 artery, the only oxygen getting to the baby is through Amanda.  There is no way her body would carry the baby full term, it would spontaneously miscarry at any time and when the baby is born, it will die as soon at the cord is cut. There will be no chance at life so on November 8 the doctors will induce labour, they expect he may take one or two breaths before passing away peacefully.

Upon hearing the news of their baby's condition Amanda and Jacquie bravely wrote a letter to their friends and family informing them of their ordeal, I've copied it below for everyone to read.  Everything I've written here thus far comes directly from this letter.  Their courage in the face of such a tragedy is inspiring, to write such words of positivity and gratitude through such pain is a testament to their character.  Heroic little Theodore is lucky to have two such amazing parents who love him unconditionally and will cherish every moment they've had together and every moment still to come.

 

There are no words of comfort to offer these brave parents, but maybe as a group we can come together at their time of need and offer our support.  We can't ease their emotional and physical burden, but maybe we can help financially.  Whether it be the cost of a memorial for Theodore, or to ease the pressure of financial obligations while they grieve, or perhaps they may need to get away after saying goodbye.  Please join me in contributing anything you can, even if it's only a few dollars, and if you can't afford to contribute it's ok.  Maybe you can help spread the word and make some noise for Heroic little Theodore,

 

Amanda & Jacquie's letter

 

Hello everyone,


I wish this letter was one for a happier reason. As you all may or may not know, I'm almost 20 weeks pregnant.
There's no easy way to tell anyone this, and I'm sorry to do it this way but I really don't have the energy to go through it many more times. I hope you will understand.
We went for a routine ultrasound on tuesday where they noticed some abnormalities in the baby. The ultrasound tech was absolutely amazing and we commend her. She excused herself and went to talk to the radiologist. They were both back a few minutes later. The radiologist, another amazing person, explained to us that the baby's head was not the right shape, the face didn't look proper and there was something wrong with the heart.
He left and we cried. The tech then asked if we wanted to see what the radiologist meant and of course we wanted to see. It was very obvious of the problem.
They called our OBGYN right away who was busy at the time so said to go home and he would call as soon as he could.
The OB called back a little while later saying he hadn't got the report from radiology yet but he was given a verbal report and said he was sending that report down to Mount Sinai as soon as he received it which he did.
We got a phone call from Mount Sinai wednesday morning at 11am and we were told to come for an appointment at 1pm to the special pregnancy unit so we said yes and left right away.
At that appointment we went in to see a doctor who brought us into a room, asked a bunch of questions and then we started the detailed ultrasound.
We were told by the previous report that they think the abnormality is chromosomal and is called Trisomy 13 or Patau Syndrome. We had actually came across that the night before doing some research so had an idea and understood what it meant but not to the extent as to what we were about to be told.
It was during the very detailed ultrasound by the doctor that we were told of everything that follows: The head is very long, there is no pronounced face, possibly a major cleft in the mouth because they cannot decipher lips or nose. There are eye sockets but no eyes, there may only be one if anything at all. Most of the brian is missing, the main component to breathe is not there, only a brain stem. There is a heart beating nice and strong but missing some valves. And the kidneys are not functioning. There are supposed to be 2 arteries and 1 vein in the umbilical cord but there is only 1 artery, the only oxygen getting to the baby is through me.
There is no way my body would carry the baby full term, it would spontaneously miscarry at any time and when the baby is born, it would die as soon at the cord is cut. There would be no quality of life, this case is apparently very extreme and very rare.
The staff was wonderfully supportive and informative. Sadly for us there is only one outcome with 2 options. A surgical which is traumatic, or natural which is more humane and we can see and hold him. Yes, the baby is a little boy!
We decided the names we had picked out did not seem to suit him what so ever so we spent time researching names and meanings that we thought would suit him. Loosely translated his name means strong gift of God-Theodore Gabriel Leliever.
I also had an amniosintesis to verify the prognosis.
We go on thursday nov 8 in the morning to register, get to our private room, get hooked up and they will proceed to induce me for labour. They say it will take almost 24 hours but he will be here possibly friday morning. We won't mind visitors during the day as I'll be given pain meds to keep me comfortable, but when the time comes to deliver we would like it to be just us, I hope you all understand. We will be home friday night or saturday depending on how the birth goes or if I have to get taken into surgery if there are any problems and there is a chance of that happening.
We will get to spend some time with him when he is born, as soon as he comes out he may take one or two breaths and then pass away peacefully. We have to name him for the birth and death certificates and will have a chaplain there to christen him as well.
Today we had to go to the funeral home and plan our unborn sons cremation. We will not have a funeral or anything, we will just get his ashes. I will be off work after that for 4-6 weeks and welcome anyone who would like to come by, family and friends love and support at this time would be very much appreciated.

I wish we didn't have to tell anyone something like this, and pray that no one has to go through anything like this either. There are no words to express the feelings of helplessness and defeat. Knowing there is absolutely nothing that could have prevented this, nothing we can do to fix it, and nothing we have done wrong in the process. It was just an extra chromosome that was created upon conception, and it is not genetic, it is not my fault nor the donors fault, it just happened. There is no reason for us to not have a very healthy baby if we decide to try again.

We don't expect anyone to know what to say or do so please don't worry about that. We just wanted you to know what was going on so that no one says the wrong thing down the road or feels bad later on by asking questions.

All our love,
Amanda and Jacquie

story:
Short Summary

The downtown Drumheller committee, part of the Drumheller Chamber of Commerce would like to enlist your help to bring some freestyle Motocross riders to Drumheller for Family Fun day on August 18, 2012

What We Need & What You Get

  • MANY other events are going on during this one day event in Drumheller including bouncy castles for the young kids, a street magic show, face painters, balloon toting clowns, and much more!!
  • The entire event is FREE to the public, but we need to raise a few more dollars to cover the FMX riders travel and costs, etc.
  • For sponsoring the event, you get a full afternoon of family friendly fun!  And, you'll feel REALLY GOOD knowing your donation helped make it happen!!

The funds and organizing of the event is being handled by the Drumheller Chamber of Commerce, specifically the downtown Drumheller sub-committee. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to volunteer to help us out with organization and planning we would love to have you involved.

story:
Myka and I are going on a cruise to Baja mexico for our honeymoon.  We have already purchased the tickets but we still need some way to get to Los Angelos the day after our wedding.

We are looking into borrowing a car but we would prefer to fly considering that this is an eleven hour drive, and that just doesn't sound fun.  The seven hundred should cover plane tickets for the both of us, as well as the neccesary shuttles from the airport to the docks. 

Thanks so much! We look forward to seeing you at the wedding!

Thanks so much! We look forward to seeing you at the wedding!

story:
My name is Moriah Salter, and I am a 2012 recipient of the Well Heart Yoga Teacher Training Scholarship. My passion for yoga has helped me through some of the hardest times in my life, and it has also helped me help my friends through some of their most difficult challenges. It has helped me connect with myself and with the earth in an empowering and healing way.

When I decided to become a teacher, at first I thought it was a pipe dream. It seemed that everywhere I turned, there was a great training program--that was out of reach for me financially.

Thankfully, I found Well Heart. Many others like me have been able to follow their calling to teach thanks to this program. But until now, the studio has funded each scholarship entirely on its own.

I am also thankful for IndieGoGo and all of our donors, as you provide a sustainable way for Well Heart Studio to keep reaching people who would otherwise be excluded from opportunities like these. 

By donating to our scholarship fund, you not only help others deepen their yoga practice; you help yourself, too! Our perks are designed to help you fit yoga into your busy schedule with home video yoga classes, and they are designed to meet your personal yogic goals through private lessons!

***Anyone who helps us spread the word and helps us meet one of our perk amounts gets the perk as if she/he had donated that amount her/himself! Just have your friends send an email to moriahsalter@yahoo.com, and have them tell us your name. You can send in your address once you reach a goal and we will send you the perk you earned with the help of others!***

story:
Update of this cause:

This campaign was started to support the girl in the video and her child with money for shelter, hospital and food. In return she would meet and give receipts, medical report and other information confirming that the help reach its goal. She did not live up to her part of the deal (did not meet us with receipts) so until she contacts us (she has the phone number) and proves that she is using the money for hospital and shelter we are cancelling this cause.

The few funders that had time to donate before we discovered this will be able to choose if they want their money back or if they want to donate it to any of our other causes within the next month.

For more causes see www.worldimproving.org where more causes will show up shortly.

We have learned our lesson about putting money and time into helping fellow human being without deeper investigation and this is the first and last cause we do without thoroughly investigating and testing the beneficiary and talking to references. 

For everyone supporting with linking and giving, you have a good heart. Sometimes our heart is stronger than our skepticism. We must try to learn from it but still be proud that we have a solid heart!

/David

story:
U-Check-It ™: Wearable Wellness Device

 

 

 

The U-Check-It™ is the world’s first wearable gadget to monitor cortisol levels. Equipped with Electrodermal activity (EDA) sensor for mood monitoring, GPS tracking, sport and activity meter, sleep monitor and body temperature monitor. The U-Check-It™ carries a SIM card and is compatible with Android phones and iPhone. 

 

The U-Check-It™ is certified by Arrow, so you can trust that the technology is real!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Why Measure Cortisol

 

The American Psychological Association stated that over 75 percent of adults experienced high stress levels in the previous month (American Psychological Association, 2017). In Great Britain, 28.3 billion Euros were spent in 2007 due to illnesses prompted by excessive stress, and the global figure stands at over 300 billion USD (National Institute for Health and Clinical Excellence). Chronic stress causes severe depression. The World Health Organization stated that depression afflicts over 250 million people in the world, but less than 25 percent receive effective treatment.

 

What is Cortisol ?

 

 

Cortisol, the end result of the hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenocortical (HPA) axis, is considered a potential key in understanding the connection between living a healthy life and managing stress. The HPA response during "fight or flight" allows humans  to maintain a balance during the onset of internal and external stress.  However, the continuous activation of the HPA system due to “chronic stress” and “poor stress management” leads to the development of allostatic load, or excessive wear on the body. Over activation of the HPA also causes irregular cortisol levels, which has been linked to cardiovascular disease, diabetes, obesity, and adrenal fatigue.

 

 

 

 

Introducing U-Check-It™

 

The U-Check-It™ is the world’s first wearable gadget to monitor cortisol levels. The gadget offers features such as Electrodermal activity (EDA) sensor for mood monitoring, GPS tracker, sport and activity meter, sleep monitor and body temperature monitor. The U-Check-It™ carries a SIM card and is compatible with Android phones and iPhone.

 

 

 

The U-Check-It™ is ideal for stress management, extreme sports and Fitness, building emotional intelligence or EQ, and entertainment

 

 

Stress Management- The user can use the U-Check-It™ platform for stress management.  The platform will continually take measurements on the user’s vitals and calibrate it for a stress number. The user can add notes at each interval to document experience, and build a cohesive stress journal.  The application can assist in developing intervention for stressful events. 

 

 

 

 

Extreme Sports/Games/Fitness- The user can use the U-Check-It ™ platform to measure their emotional state and vitals during their activities. By knowing cortisol levels, an individual may have a greater awareness of  adrenal exhaustion, which may cause excessive inflammation, and increase susceptibility to injury or illness. By using U-Check-It ™, active people may be able to improve performance and recovery time like professional athletes.

 

 

 

 

Build Emotional Intelligence (EQ) - The user can use the U-Check-It ™ platform to build valuable skills to improve their emotional intelligence. Due to neuroplasticity, or the ability for the brain to change, users may improve their reaction to stressful events through interactive gaming app and feedback. Did you know that over 90% of high achievers have a high EQ? In addition, having a higher EQ may reduce occupational stress, and improve decision making skills. On average, people with a higher EQ make more money annually than there lower EQ counterparts.

 

 

 

 

Entertainment/Market Research- The user can use the U-Check-It ™ platform for entertainment purposes.  The platform will be able to measure a user’s vitals and physiological state during entertainment events (e.g. video games, movies, shopping, etc).  This data could be used to gauge overall satisfaction of consumer products and services.

 

 

 

How the U-Check-It ™ Works

 

 

The U-Check-It™ works by measuring salivary cortisol levels with only three steps:

  • Place the biological  cartridge into mouth for 50 seconds
  • Put cartridge into biological hormone reader
  • Get results with cortisol interpretation and stress number

The system generates a snapshot of the user’s stress profile. Results can be shared with family and friends.

 

 

 

The U-Check-It ™ features Include:

• Sensor for measuring cortisol hormone

• EDA sensor for mood monitoring

• Built-in GPS tracker

• Sport and activity monitoring

• Sleep monitoring 

• Body temperature monitoring

• Optional sim card slot

• Bluetooth low energy (4.0)

• Accelerometer/Gyroscope

• Rechargeable battery Lithium-Ion battery 200 mAh capacity

• Vibrating motor

• OLED screen

• UV Light Cartridge 

• Compatible App for Android and iPhone (Coming Soon)

• Multiple Sizes: Small,  Medium, Large

• Customize colors to fit your fashion or personality

• Receive notifications (Text messages and alerts)

• Remotely control the camera on your smartphone

 

The development of the U-Check-It™ system began in April 2015. The company’s founder, Alfred Bedell, noticed that a high percentage of clubhouse members were being hospitalized for stress induced health issues. The clubhouse members had compounded diagnoses such as mental illness, and depression. Ten (10) members voluntarily responded to questions about stress. The assessment revealed that all respondents suffered reduced quality of life due to chronic stress, and 90% of them said that they would use a stress management product if it could provide information about their current stress levels. After receiving  feedback, a proof of concept was made.

 

                                                           PROOF OF CONCEPT BOARDS (POC)

To realize the goal of developing a stress monitoring device, Bedell Innovations has been engaging several organizations and companies.

The team participated in the 2016 Jefferson Health Hack, hosted by Jefferson University in Philadelphia, where they were able to demonstrate the key functions of the proposed device. The team was also selected as finalist for the Temple University 2016 Innovative Idea Competition.

 

 

The company was selected as semi-finalist in the NextFab Rapid Cohort for spring 2017. They received 3 months of support from trained engineers and technicians on the development of a full-scale production model. 

The company was also accepted into the Arrow Incubation & certification program for product development.

In August 2017, Bedell Innovations signed an NDA with an american based manufacturing company, and is collaborating with them to finalize the manufacturing strategy of the product.

 As of December 2017, the company has conducted over 400 customer assessments regarding the development of U-Check-It™.

 

During the Fall semester of 2017, Bedell Innovations has been working with  interns from the University of Penn to validate and test the feasibility of the U-Check-It™ system.

 

To date, the company has successfully designed four (4) different working
prototype iterations.

 

 

 

The company is passionate about giving people the opportunity to check their stress level anywhere and anytime.  Bedell Innovations believes in proactive healthcare which has the potential to save money, save families, and save lives. 

“Our team believes that having the ability to monitor the stress hormone remotely and at point-of-care can provide tremendous benefits for individuals looking to improve health & wellness.”  -Alfred Bedell  (CEO)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Backers will have the opportunity to get early access to the U-Check-It ™ system with up to 40% discount (MSRP $299.99) on Indiegogo.com.


We are fully committed to our goal of delivering a quality product, and we will not receive a single penny unless we meet our goal.

 

 

What is U-Check-It?

U-Check-It ™ is the world’s first wearable to monitor the stress hormone, cortisol, in real-time.

Is U-Check-It a Medical Device?

No, the U-Check-It is a  general wellness product. A general wellness product is designed for the purposes of maintaining or encouraging a general state of health or a healthy activity, or  an intended use that relates the role of healthy lifestyle with helping to reduce the risk or impact of certain chronic diseases or conditions and where it is well understood and accepted that
healthy lifestyle choices may play an important role in health outcomes for the disease or
condition. 
The U-Check-It claims to promote relaxation or manage stress. It is a portable product that is intended to monitor the stress level of individuals during exercise and physical activity.

The U-Check-It mobile application solely monitors and records stress levels to “allow awareness of one’s stress aptitude in order to improve or maintain good health.

The U-Check-It systems:
o    Does not require an invasive sampling procedure that presents significant risk;

o    Does not by design or intention introduce energy into a subject; and

o    Is not used as a diagnostic procedure without confirmation by another medically established diagnostic product or procedure.

o    Is not intended to treat diagnose any specific medical condition. In addition, it is not designed to sustain or manage chronic diseases in humans. 

Does the product come in different colors?

Yes, backers will be able to vote on their favorite colors when the campaign ends.

 

Use of Funds

The funds received from the campaign will be used to finalize our manufacturing strategy and to enhance our buying power to bring the U-Check-It to life.

 

Why Crowdfund

 The crowdfunding platform presents multiple advantages such as to: raise awareness among customers about U-Check-It™ products and services; allow customers to evaluate the U-Check-It™ system and provide the company with early feedback about product value proposition; present an opportunity for early adopters to purchase the products and services at a discounted rate; present an opportunity for the company to deliver a value proposition to customers and begin the process of brand building;  creates a platform for post-purchase customer support that will assist the company during future production iterations. 


 

Please email us with any additional questions at info@bedellinnovations.com
story_txt:
U-Check-It ™: Wearable Wellness Device   The U-Check-It™ is the world’s first wearable gadget to monitor cortisol levels. Equipped with Electrodermal activity (EDA) sensor for mood monitoring, GPS tracking, sport and activity meter, sleep monitor and body temperature monitor. The U-Check-It™ carries a SIM card and is compatible with Android phones and iPhone.  The U-Check-It™ is certified by Arrow, so you can trust that the technology is real!            Why Measure Cortisol The American Psychological Association stated that over 75 percent of adults experienced high stress levels in the previous month (American Psychological Association, 2017). In Great Britain, 28.3 billion Euros were spent in 2007 due to illnesses prompted by excessive stress, and the global figure stands at over 300 billion USD (National Institute for Health and Clinical Excellence). Chronic stress causes severe depression. The World Health Organization stated that depression afflicts over 250 million people in the world, but less than 25 percent receive effective treatment. What is Cortisol ?  Cortisol, the end result of the hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenocortical (HPA) axis, is considered a potential key in understanding the connection between living a healthy life and managing stress. The HPA response during "fight or flight" allows humans  to maintain a balance during the onset of internal and external stress.  However, the continuous activation of the HPA system due to “chronic stress” and “poor stress management” leads to the development of allostatic load, or excessive wear on the body. Over activation of the HPA also causes irregular cortisol levels, which has been linked to cardiovascular disease, diabetes, obesity, and adrenal fatigue.    Introducing U-Check-It™ 
The U-Check-It™ is the world’s first wearable gadget to monitor cortisol levels. The gadget offers features such as Electrodermal activity (EDA) sensor for mood monitoring, GPS tracker, sport and activity meter, sleep monitor and body temperature monitor. The U-Check-It™ carries a SIM card and is compatible with Android phones and iPhone.
 

 
 
The U-Check-It™ is ideal for stress management, extreme sports and Fitness, building emotional intelligence or EQ, and entertainment
 

 
Stress Management- The user can use the U-Check-It™ platform for stress management.  The platform will continually take measurements on the user’s vitals and calibrate it for a stress number. The user can add notes at each interval to document experience, and build a cohesive stress journal.  The application can assist in developing intervention for stressful events. 
 

 
 

 
Extreme Sports/Games/Fitness- The user can use the U-Check-It ™ platform to measure their emotional state and vitals during their activities. By knowing cortisol levels, an individual may have a greater awareness of  adrenal exhaustion, which may cause excessive inflammation, and increase susceptibility to injury or illness. By using U-Check-It ™, active people may be able to improve performance and recovery time like professional athletes.
 
 

 

 
Build Emotional Intelligence (EQ) - The user can use the U-Check-It ™ platform to build valuable skills to improve their emotional intelligence. Due to neuroplasticity, or the ability for the brain to change, users may improve their reaction to stressful events through interactive gaming app and feedback. Did you know that over 90% of high achievers have a high EQ? In addition, having a higher EQ may reduce occupational stress, and improve decision making skills. On average, people with a higher EQ make more money annually than there lower EQ counterparts.
 

 
 

 
Entertainment/Market Research- The user can use the U-Check-It ™ platform for entertainment purposes.  The platform will be able to measure a user’s vitals and physiological state during entertainment events (e.g. video games, movies, shopping, etc).  This data could be used to gauge overall satisfaction of consumer products and services.

 
 
 
How the U-Check-It ™ Works
 

 
The U-Check-It™ works by measuring salivary cortisol levels with only three steps:

Place the biological  cartridge into mouth for 50 seconds
Put cartridge into biological hormone reader
Get results with cortisol interpretation and stress number

The system generates a snapshot of the user’s stress profile. Results can be shared with family and friends.
 
 
 

The U-Check-It ™ features Include:
• Sensor for measuring cortisol hormone
• EDA sensor for mood monitoring
• Built-in GPS tracker
• Sport and activity monitoring
• Sleep monitoring 
• Body temperature monitoring
• Optional sim card slot
• Bluetooth low energy (4.0)
• Accelerometer/Gyroscope
• Rechargeable battery Lithium-Ion battery 200 mAh capacity
• Vibrating motor
• OLED screen
• UV Light Cartridge 
• Compatible App for Android and iPhone (Coming Soon)
• Multiple Sizes: Small,  Medium, Large
• Customize colors to fit your fashion or personality
• Receive notifications (Text messages and alerts)
• Remotely control the camera on your smartphone

 

The development of the U-Check-It™ system began in April 2015. The company’s founder, Alfred Bedell, noticed that a high percentage of clubhouse members were being hospitalized for stress induced health issues. The clubhouse members had compounded diagnoses such as mental illness, and depression. Ten (10) members voluntarily responded to questions about stress. The assessment revealed that all respondents suffered reduced quality of life due to chronic stress, and 90% of them said that they would use a stress management product if it could provide information about their current stress levels. After receiving  feedback, a proof of concept was made.
 

                                                           PROOF OF CONCEPT BOARDS (POC)
To realize the goal of developing a stress monitoring device, Bedell Innovations has been engaging several organizations and companies.
The team participated in the 2016 Jefferson Health Hack, hosted by Jefferson University in Philadelphia, where they were able to demonstrate the key functions of the proposed device. The team was also selected as finalist for the Temple University 2016 Innovative Idea Competition.
 

 
The company was selected as semi-finalist in the NextFab Rapid Cohort for spring 2017. They received 3 months of support from trained engineers and technicians on the development of a full-scale production model. 
The company was also accepted into the Arrow Incubation & certification program for product development.
In August 2017, Bedell Innovations signed an NDA with an american based manufacturing company, and is collaborating with them to finalize the manufacturing strategy of the product.
 As of December 2017, the company has conducted over 400 customer assessments regarding the development of U-Check-It™.
 
During the Fall semester of 2017, Bedell Innovations has been working with  interns from the University of Penn to validate and test the feasibility of the U-Check-It™ system.
 
To date, the company has successfully designed four (4) different workingprototype iterations.
 

 
 
The company is passionate about giving people the opportunity to check their stress level anywhere and anytime.  Bedell Innovations believes in proactive healthcare which has the potential to save money, save families, and save lives. 
“Our team believes that having the ability to monitor the stress hormone remotely and at point-of-care can provide tremendous benefits for individuals looking to improve health & wellness.”  -Alfred Bedell  (CEO)
 
 

 
 
 

 
Backers will have the opportunity to get early access to the U-Check-It ™ system with up to 40% discount (MSRP $299.99) on Indiegogo.com.



We are fully committed to our goal of delivering a quality product, and we will not receive a single penny unless we meet our goal.

A general wellness product is designed for the purposes of maintaining or encouraging a general state of health or a healthy activity, or  an intended use that relates the role of healthy lifestyle with helping to reduce the risk or impact of certain chronic diseases or conditions and where it is well understood and accepted thathealthy lifestyle choices may play an important role in health outcomes for the disease orcondition. The U-Check-It claims to promote relaxation or manage stress. It is a portable product that is intended to monitor the stress level of individuals during exercise and physical activity.
The U-Check-It mobile application solely monitors and records stress levels to “allow awareness of one’s stress aptitude in order to improve or maintain good health.
The U-Check-It systems:o    Does not require an invasive sampling procedure that presents significant risk;

story:
Unlike traditional wearable devices that are bulky and uncomfortable to wear, PEM Wave™CARE has the smallest and most discreet design; just attach it to your skin or wear it as a necklace.

< Pem Wave™CARE - Direction of use >




Our goal is to produce a wearable device that anyone can readily use anywhere, without a burden of expense. Our highly professional team devoted 7 years of investigation and its best efforts to produce a healthcare device that effectively treats severe pain and infections. The result was PEM Wave™CARE, a wearable device proven to provide relief of chronic pain and improve blood circulation.

We hope to share and further develop our advanced device with you.

The World's Smallest Medical Device

We have invented the smallest wearable medical device that is easy to use, so patients can cure themselves at any time. This device is amazingly small and slim - it is only 36mm wide, 7.8mm thick.  


PEM Wave™ comprises 6 different products. The PEM Wave™CARE for chronic pain, PEM Wave™CURE for the treatment of chronic disease, PEM Wave™WELL for woman, PEM Wave™RIPE for student,  PEM Wave™BACK for senior, and PEM Wave™ABLE for man.

In this Indiegogo campaign, we are leading a campaign for PEM Wave™CARE. 

PEM Wave™CARE is the world's only wearable medical device that provides relief of chronic pain and improves blood circulation. PEM Wave™CARE is a 100% drug free new therapy technology proven to relieve pain.



A Scientific Breakthrough For Tangible Results In Promoting Wellness.

This device emits lower intensity magnetic field frequency that asymmetrically oscillates giving a significant treatment within 30 cm of distance from your body.



Supported Therapy Modes

Featuring 9 different modes for relieving pain and inflammation, muscle damage and improving overall wellness, this revolutionary device can provide highly effective medical treatment and timely prevention against various diseases.


Clinically Proven of PEMF Therapy



PEM Wave™CARE is the world's safest medical device of getting exempted from the US FDA certification (FDA class I, 510K) that has an excellent treatment effect with the use of PEMF principle.

We will give you 100% of money back within 90 days of purchase if your pain persists after treating yourself for one full session (10 weeks) of the ‘PEM Wave™CARE Recovery Program'. The effective treatment rate of the PEMF-based PEM Wave™CARE is around 80~90%, so your chronic pain might not be perfectly improved, but you should expect an improvement nonetheless.

It is strongly anticipated that you would experience not only the effect of pain relief, but also various positive changes in your body, including the improvement of blood circulation among other benefits. We also expect that additional improvement or treatment of other diseases may also happen. If you find yourself having these great benefits, we suggest you to continually use PEM Wave™CARE with the purpose of wellness, instead of just pain relieving.

If you are not satisfied with your wellness improvement, please make a PayPal account first, and send your PayPal account information to support@nautilus-lab.com for a full refund.



PEM Wave™CARE vs other Portable PEMF Therapy

Many inconveniences accompany using the PEMF medical devices, generally used in medical clinics. You have to visit the hospital to receive the treatment, and the highly intensive PEMF is not suitable for chronic treatment, due to its potential hazardous effects on human bodies.

Our innovative wearable technology made it possible to wear a device, instead of the conventional portable PEMF medical devices. It is the world's safest medical device with its ultra-low intensity magnetic field.



PEM Wave™CARE vs other Wearable Therapy

There are several types of wearable pain relieving medical devices in the market. However, they are too large in size and complex in structure, so users often feel uncomfortable wearing them. Also, they are relatively expensive.

PEM Wave™CARE, the world's smallest wearable device, can be simply attached to your clothes or skin to provide treatment effects.




PEM Wave™CARE vs TENS

The TENS (Transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation) electrically stimulates your nerves to temporarily relieve your pain. TENS-type devices require electrodes to be attached to your skin to generate electrical stimulation, which might cause inconvenience and discomfort. They also involve the additional high cost of above 25 US$ per month to exchange the electrodes.

PEM Wave™CARE is the most convenient device. It does not require strong electrical stimulation, uncomfortable belts or bands, additional expenses to exchange electrodes, or difficult settings, typically involved in TENS devices.


Provides treatment and healthcare at the same time.  

This device includes healthcare capabilities that not only soothe your pain, but also improve blood circulation and immunity.

Many diseases are related to blood circulation. Natural improvement of blood circulation brings additional wellness effects, including prevention of chronic pain, deep sleep, skin care, anti-aging, enhanced sexual function, and weight loss.

This device is essential not only for the health care of pain patients, but also for family members.


This is an innovative treatment method.

We established a new theory in the medical aspect that human bodies comprise three-dimensional energetic layers, and we developed the new treatment method, grounded on such theory.

This treatment method adjusts the distorted natural frequencies of each of the six energetic layers of blood, muscles, tendons, ligaments, nerves, and joints. The adjusted natural frequencies brings back your health and provides the treatment and prevention effects against diseases to help keep you healthy.


The device itself provides Bluetooth. 

PEM Wave™CARE contains Bluetooth. Patients can operate the device through Bluetooth and smartphone app to manage their most effective, personalized treatment method throughout the day. 

In addition, this smartphone app sends all treatment relevant information to the server. The data collected in the server is analyzed and used as big data that is applied for all patients. 


It is the world’s safest treatment.

Note that there are no side effects and it is safe for everyone, no matter the age.

To date PEMF Therapy has proven safe. However there is concern today regarding exposure to Electromagnetic Fields (EMF) causing health problems. It seems the cumulative exposure to EMF day in and day out is of the greatest concern from all manner of electrical devices in our lives as many of these devices emit high frequencies in the kilohertz, megahertz and gigahertz range.

It is therefore a matter of distinguishing good EMF from bad EMF. Science teaches us that all energy is electromagnetic in nature hence it is impossible to escape EMF altogether because our own bodies radiate EMF as does all of nature.

PEM Wave™Care uses pulses of low frequency electro-magnetic energy for short durations. Research has shown this is not detrimental to the body but quite the opposite, increasing oxygenation to the cells, improving blood circulation and lymph flow, aiding detoxification and enhancing cell metabolism, energy production and integrity.


You can also operate your device through Bluetooth and our smartphone App for personalized treatment 24/7; anywhere, anytime.


Smartphone App.

The process in the treatment and information, regarding your results, is sent to your smartphone through Bluetooth once the application is activated. 

After opening the smartphone application, chronic pain or other diseases and the prescribed usage time can be selected on the main screen. When the treatment button is pressed, treatment is performed throughout a designated time. 

The treatment records of PEM Wave™CARE are sent to your smartphone in real time. The application saves the treatment records, frequency, and time, and sends it to the data server online, where it analyzes treatment patterns. These patterns keep you informed of your treatment patterns.

You can record the results of the treatment from PEM Wave™CARE on this application. We will continually update and manage the application using the big data from numerous users of this device to provide you with the best treatment method, expected time, and expected results. 


PEM Wave™ recharges the whole body. A deficiency of electromagnetism in the body is like running out of air. PEM Wave™ creates electro-magnetic fields matching those produced by the earth and our bodies. PEM Wave™ is a simple, fast, and effective way to improve the healing potential of each and every cell in the body!

PEM Wave™ re-energizes damaged cells by inducing electrical changes within the cell that restore it to it’s normal healthy state. Because of this, cellular metabolism is boosted, blood cells are regenerated, circulation is improved and oxygen carrying capacity is increased. Ultimately, the immune system becomes healthier, the nervous system relaxes, bones and joints become stronger and vital organs such as the liver, kidneys and colon are able to rid themselves of impurities thus detoxifying the body. PEM Wave™ can reduce pain and improve the quality of your life by allowing your body to function as it was designed to do.








We started the development of this medical device from prototyping in 2013 through the Alpha Stages and have finalized the final Betas of wearable types in fall 2015. 

We have completed the development process. The production and registration  of FDA will be done for sales in the US markets. 






Wellness & Healthcare Aspects

Poor blood circulation leads to insufficient nutrition supply, which results in decreased skin regeneration and makes your body easily damaged by external stimuli. Also, oxygen deficiency, due to poor blood circulation, makes your skin dry and rough, promoting skin aging, reducing elasticity, and increasing wrinkles. It also causes insomnia or male sexual dysfunction.

Medical Aspects

Many diseases are related to blood circulation.

Most patients suffering from chronic diseases have blood circulation problems . In particular, celebrant infarction, cardiac infarction, hypertension, artery hardening, and nephritis are caused by blood circulation disorders.

If we observe the blood of a cancer patient, the red blood cells are tangled to clog the capillary vessels, which cause oxygen deficiency and cause cancer. There is no cancer in a heart, because it always circulates blood. Therefore, you can prevent various diseases, including cancer, by improving blood circulation.



Nautilus Lab. has been independent from its mother company, since 2014, in order to produce an innovative wearable medical device. We are a start-up company, led by Korean-American Eunice.

This company is a subsidiary company of TouchnFun Interactive (HK) Ltd., which was established in Hong Kong, in 2003. Currently, the company is based in Korea with a US Riverside office. 

In 2015, we passed the local government evaluation in Korea. We are now based in ‘Wonju Medical device Complex Center’ where government officials specialized in the area of medicine are supporting us. 

We have finished the development of our innovative wearable medical device with the hi-tech testing materials and researchers supported by the government. 

After successfully finishing this campaign, we plan to start the production of PEM Wave™ through GMP for FDA registration in our own factory situated in ‘Wonju Medical device Complex Center’. 




Pulsed Energetic Multi-Layer System

We categorized the body’s skin, blood vessel, muscle, tendon, ligament, nerves, joints, and bone marrow into 8 three-dimensional energetic layers. Among these, except for the skin and the bone marrow, 6 energetic layers could be cured by finding the distorted natural frequency and treating it, reverting it to its natural state. 

We applied the PEMF treatment technology and meridian system to the various energetic layers in order to settle and rearrange the distorted balance in the body.


SYNTONIZATION

Every single cell, tissue, and organ system within the human body has a certain natural frequency, helping to regulate important functions and keep us healthy. The human body vibrating within its natural frequency range is considered in a state of health. 

When the natural frequencies of the body are disturbed by internal or external causes, they become distorted and lowered, leading to symptoms and eventually disease in the body.

We have developed a new treatment method that corrects the imbalance of biomedical energy due to distorted natural frequency. Through this treatment, the natural frequency can be restored and at the same time, diseases can be cured and prevented. 


When a cell, such as a red blood cell, is damaged, it loses the ideal charge. This causes red cells to stick together and stack like coins, making circulation slow. When PEM Wave™ passes through the red cell, the membrane becomes properly charged, allowing the red cell to keep separate from other red cells, thereby improving circulation. 

In addition, PEM Wave™ increases various chemicals in the blood vessel walls that cause the blood vessels to dilate, improving the amount of blood flowing through the vessels and therefore increasing the amount of oxygen delivered to the tissues.



Soft tissue are made up of billions of cells each of which is surrounded by a semi-permeable membrane. Through this membrane pass certain types of ions known as ‘cations’, which flow into the cells, and ‘anions’, which flow out. The flow of ions would produce a miniscule but virtually undetectable magnetic field. If the cell is damaged, then the flow of ions may be reduced and hence the cell either is reduced in its function, or dies. Without ions, a cell cannot live. 

When PEM Wave™ is applied over a damaged area, it penetrates into the tissues and has the effect of inducing movement of ions, back into alignment. The result is that the ions once again return to their correct position within the cell. The cell regains its natural healthy balance, and any damage is repaired.


PEMF [Pulsed Electro-Magnetic Field Therapy] therapy is already registered by the FDA to promote the healing of bone fractures and is in the process of being approved for many other uses, from migraines to depression, to sports injuries.

We are planning the process for the PEM Wave™CARE to register as a Medical device in US. The PEM Wave™CARE along with other medical devices that have applied PEMF technology is FDA class I, 510 (K) exempt safe and is a medical device that is proven to be effective. Thus, there will be no risks in selling this device after FDA registration.


We have invested an enormous amount of time and effort for this project, and finally after seven years, it is completed for production. We are so thankful for your participation and support. We provide an easy and safe way to treat disease in the patients, suffering pain and health issues, with little economic pressure.

You need not worry about the production process nor the quality of our products. We will guarantee the best quality. We are cooperating with medical experts in our factory within the Wonju Medical Device Center, an advanced medical device facility operated by the local government of Korea.

Also, you need not worry about the remedial effects. The PEMF treatment method has been used in medical clinics in the U.S. and Europe for 60 years, and our method is a more advanced version of the existing PEMF treatment.

With over 4 years of medical inspection of the treatment effects of our device, we have finally acquired the best results. There are already various devices in the market, using the PEMF method to relieve pain, inflammation, sports injuries, insomnia, urinary incontinence, and menstrual pain, and the U.S. FDA has approved their medicinal effects.

Using our innovative wearable technology, we will provide a highly effective treatment, while minimizing the size of the conventional PEMF treatment device.


We have completed the development of PEM Wave™CURE, which can cure 8 types of chronic diseases. We will reveal the PEM Wave™CURE after successfully ending this campaign. Since this medical device requires FDA class I or II clearance, it will take a long time to get it in the market. Thus, we desperately need your help. 

If you sign the preclinical research project for the PEM Wave™CURE at the next Indiegogo campaign, we will send you samples for preclinical research within 30 days. Your participation in the preclinical research data will dramatically decrease the time required for FDA clearance of PEM Wave™CURE. 

We hope for a new medical world, where people can save money on medical clinic fees and cure their chronic diseases themselves. PEM Wave™CURE has 8 illness treatment modes that are set for service. The participant can choose the treatment, according to personal needs and test it out himself.

< PEM Wave™CURE Preclinical Research List >


You Can Now Help Us Make A Difference.

We sincerely hope many people will live happier lives without pain from diseases and spend time and effort developing the PEM Wave™. 

Our first goal is to get funding through this campaign to collect money for production. However, more importantly, we hope to share this new wearable medical device with more people and develop it together. 

With your financial support, we will be able to:

- The costs regarding molding, GMP screening, and FDA registration for the manufacturing of the product.

- Align with medical researchers worldwide 

- Build a community for patients

We look forward to establishing a new wellness lifestyle with your investment. Such a lifestyle will help the patients readily treat their pains and diseases without any burdens.

We understand that it is very difficult to break the frame of the existing medical treatment method. However, your participation in this project will give you the chance to break from these inconvenient norms.

We have long been making our best efforts to complete this project. We sincerely hope that this innovative device will be released into the world through your active support and participation.The costs regarding molding, GMP screening, and FDA registration for the manufacturing of the product.


Who can use PEM Wave™CARE?
Virtually anyone who suffers from pain and stiffness associated with muscles, joints, arthritis, sprains and strains can use PEM Wave™CARE to treat their symptoms. Parental supervision is recommended for use on children under the age of 10.
Will I feel any pain during the treatment?
NO. The pulsed electro-magnetic pulses can be adjusted to you individually so they do not hurt, however you will feel the pulsing of the magnetic current during treatment.
Is PEM Wave™CARE available internationally?
It is our intention make PEM Wave™CARE available worldwide. As with all medical devices, PEM Wave™CARE will be subject to local regulation and requirements. 

When will my order ship?
PEM Wave™CARE will be shipped once the campaign concludes, and  deliveries will be made in September 2016.

How can I reach Customer Service?
PEM Wave™CARE comes with a one-year warranty.

What if I change my mind?
During the campaign, the Indiegogo Support team can take care of all refund requests. Purchasers can contact support@indiegogo.com directly, before the campaign deadline, for prompt processing of all such requests. 

How can I reach Customer Service?
PEM Wave™CARE comes with a one-year warranty.

What can I do if forget to pay shipping or miss the shipping address?
Contact support@nautilus-lab.com

Don't see your question?
Please email our Customer Care team email address at: support@nautilus-lab.com and somebody will get back to you as soon as possible.
Disclaimer
Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

days of purchase if your pain persists after treating yourself for one
full session (10 weeks) of the ‘PEM Wave™CARE Recovery Program'.
The effective treatment rate of the PEMF-based PEM Wave™CARE is around 80~90%,
so your chronic pain might not be perfectly improved, but you should expect an
improvement nonetheless.
It is strongly anticipated that you would experience not only
the effect of pain relief, but also various positive changes in your body,
including the improvement of blood circulation among other benefits. We also
expect that additional improvement or treatment of other diseases may also
happen. If you find yourself having these great benefits, we suggest you to
continually use PEM Wave™CARE with the purpose of wellness, instead of just
pain relieving.
If you are not satisfied with your wellness improvement, please
make a PayPal account first, and send your PayPal account information to support@nautilus-lab.com for
a full refund.








PEM Wave™CARE vs other Portable PEMF Therapy


Many inconveniences accompany using the PEMF medical devices, generally used in medical clinics. You have to visit the hospital to receive the treatment, and the highly intensive PEMF is not suitable for chronic treatment, due to its potential hazardous effects on human bodies.
Our innovative wearable technology made it possible to wear a device, instead of the conventional portable PEMF medical devices. It is the world's safest medical device with its ultra-low intensity magnetic field.









PEM Wave™CARE vs other Wearable Therapy


There are several types of wearable pain relieving medical devices in the market. However, they are too large in size and complex in structure, so users often feel uncomfortable wearing them. Also, they are relatively expensive.
PEM Wave™CARE, the world's smallest wearable device, can be simply attached to your clothes or skin to provide treatment effects.









PEM Wave™CARE vs TENS


The TENS (Transcutaneous electrical nerve
stimulation) electrically stimulates your nerves to temporarily relieve your
pain. TENS-type devices require electrodes to be attached to your skin to
generate electrical stimulation, which might cause inconvenience and discomfort.
They also involve the additional high cost of above 25 US$ per month to
exchange the electrodes.
PEM Wave™CARE is the most convenient device. It does
not require strong electrical stimulation, uncomfortable belts or bands,
additional expenses to exchange electrodes, or difficult settings, typically
involved in TENS devices.












Provides treatment and healthcare at the same time.  







This device includes healthcare capabilities
that not only soothe your pain, but also improve blood circulation and
immunity.
Many diseases are related to blood circulation.
Natural improvement of blood circulation brings additional wellness effects,
including prevention of chronic pain, deep sleep, skin care, anti-aging,
enhanced sexual function, and weight loss.
This device is essential not only for the
health care of pain patients, but also for family members.





This is an innovative treatment method.






We established a new theory in the medical aspect that human bodies comprise three-dimensional energetic layers, and we developed the new treatment method, grounded on such theory.
This treatment method adjusts the
distorted natural frequencies of each of the six energetic layers of blood,
muscles, tendons, ligaments, nerves, and joints. The adjusted natural
frequencies brings back your health and provides the treatment and prevention
effects against diseases to help keep you healthy.





The device itself provides Bluetooth. 


PEM Wave™CARE contains Bluetooth. Patients can operate the device through Bluetooth and smartphone app to manage their most effective, personalized treatment method throughout the day. 
In addition, this smartphone app sends all treatment relevant information to the server. The data collected in the server is analyzed and used as big data that is applied for all patients. 





It is the world’s safest treatment.







Note that there are no side effects and it is safe for everyone, no matter the age.
To date PEMF Therapy has proven safe. However there is concern today regarding exposure to Electromagnetic Fields (EMF) causing health problems. It seems the cumulative exposure to EMF day in and day out is of the greatest concern from all manner of electrical devices in our lives as many of these devices emit high frequencies in the kilohertz, megahertz and gigahertz range.
It is therefore a matter of distinguishing good EMF from bad EMF. Science teaches us that all energy is electromagnetic in nature hence it is impossible to escape EMF altogether because our own bodies radiate EMF as does all of nature.
PEM Wave™Care uses pulses of low frequency electro-magnetic energy for short durations. Research has shown this is not detrimental to the body but quite the opposite, increasing oxygenation to the cells, improving blood circulation and lymph flow, aiding detoxification and enhancing cell metabolism, energy production and integrity.




You can also operate your device through Bluetooth and our smartphone App for personalized treatment 24/7; anywhere, anytime.





Smartphone App.

The process in the treatment and information, regarding your results, is sent to your smartphone through Bluetooth once the application is activated. 




After opening the smartphone application, chronic pain or other diseases and the prescribed usage time can be selected on the main screen. When the treatment button is pressed, treatment is performed throughout a designated time. 



The treatment records of PEM Wave™CARE are sent to your smartphone in real time. The application saves the treatment records, frequency, and time, and sends it to the data server online, where it analyzes treatment patterns. These patterns keep you informed of your treatment patterns.
You can record the results of the treatment from PEM Wave™CARE on this application. We will continually update and manage the application using the big data from numerous users of this device to provide you with the best treatment method, expected time, and expected results. 








PEM Wave™ recharges the whole body. A deficiency of electromagnetism in the body is like running out of air. PEM Wave™ creates electro-magnetic fields matching those produced by the earth and our bodies. PEM Wave™ is a simple, fast, and effective way to improve the healing potential of each and every cell in the body!
PEM Wave™ re-energizes damaged cells by inducing electrical changes within the cell that restore it to it’s normal healthy state. Because of this, cellular metabolism is boosted, blood cells are regenerated, circulation is improved and oxygen carrying capacity is increased. Ultimately, the immune system becomes healthier, the nervous system relaxes, bones and joints become stronger and vital organs such as the liver, kidneys and colon are able to rid themselves of impurities thus detoxifying the body. PEM Wave™ can reduce pain and improve the quality of your life by allowing your body to function as it was designed to do.














































We started the development of this medical device from prototyping in 2013 through the Alpha Stages and have finalized the final Betas of wearable types in fall 2015. 
We have completed the development process. The production and registration  of FDA will be done for sales in the US markets. 

























Wellness & Healthcare Aspects

Poor blood circulation leads to insufficient nutrition supply, which results in decreased skin regeneration and makes your body easily damaged by external stimuli. Also, oxygen deficiency, due to poor blood circulation, makes your skin dry and rough, promoting skin aging, reducing elasticity, and increasing wrinkles. It also causes insomnia or male sexual dysfunction.


Medical Aspects

Many diseases are related to blood circulation.
Most patients suffering from chronic diseases have blood circulation problems . In particular, celebrant infarction, cardiac infarction, hypertension, artery hardening, and nephritis are caused by blood circulation disorders.
If we observe the blood of a cancer patient, the red blood cells are tangled to clog the capillary vessels, which cause oxygen deficiency and cause cancer. There is no cancer in a heart, because it always circulates blood. Therefore, you can prevent various diseases, including cancer, by improving blood circulation.












Nautilus Lab. has been independent
from its mother company, since 2014, in order to produce an
innovative wearable medical device. We are a start-up company, led by
Korean-American Eunice. 
This company is a subsidiary company
of TouchnFun Interactive (HK) Ltd., which was established in Hong Kong, in
2003. Currently, the company is based in Korea with a US Riverside office. 


In 2015, we passed the local government evaluation in Korea. We are now based in ‘Wonju Medical device Complex Center’ where government officials specialized in the area of medicine are supporting us. 
We have finished the development of our innovative wearable medical device with the hi-tech testing materials and researchers supported by the government. 
After successfully finishing this campaign, we plan to start the production of PEM Wave™ through GMP for FDA registration in our own factory situated in ‘Wonju Medical device Complex Center’. 















Pulsed Energetic Multi-Layer System





We categorized the body’s skin, blood vessel, muscle, tendon, ligament, nerves, joints, and bone marrow into 8 three-dimensional energetic layers. Among these, except for the skin and the bone marrow, 6 energetic layers could be cured by finding the distorted natural frequency and treating it, reverting it to its natural state. 
We applied the PEMF treatment technology and meridian system to the various energetic layers in order to settle and rearrange the distorted balance in the body.

SYNTONIZATION

Every single cell, tissue, and organ system within the human body has a certain natural frequency, helping to regulate important functions and keep us healthy. The human body vibrating within its natural frequency range is considered in a state of health. 
When the natural frequencies of the body are disturbed by internal or external causes, they become distorted and lowered, leading to symptoms and eventually disease in the body.
We have developed a new treatment method that corrects the imbalance of biomedical energy due to distorted natural frequency. Through this treatment, the natural frequency can be restored and at the same time, diseases can be cured and prevented. 




When a cell, such as a red blood cell, is damaged, it loses the ideal charge. This causes red cells to stick together and stack like coins, making circulation slow. When PEM Wave™ passes through the red cell, the membrane becomes properly charged, allowing the red cell to keep separate from other red cells, thereby improving circulation. 

In addition, PEM Wave™ increases various chemicals in the blood vessel walls that cause the blood vessels to dilate, improving the amount of blood flowing through the vessels and therefore increasing the amount of oxygen delivered to the tissues.




Soft tissue are made up of billions of cells each of which is surrounded by a semi-permeable membrane. Through this membrane pass certain types of ions known as ‘cations’, which flow into the cells, and ‘anions’, which flow out. The flow of ions would produce a miniscule but virtually undetectable magnetic field. If the cell is damaged, then the flow of ions may be reduced and hence the cell either is reduced in its function, or dies. Without ions, a cell cannot live. 
When PEM Wave™ is applied over a damaged area, it penetrates into the tissues and has the effect of inducing movement of ions, back into alignment. The result is that the ions once again return to their correct position within the cell. The cell regains its natural healthy balance, and any damage is repaired.





PEMF [Pulsed Electro-Magnetic Field Therapy] therapy is already registered by the FDA to promote the healing of bone fractures and is in the process of being approved for many other uses, from migraines to depression, to sports injuries.
We are planning the process for the PEM Wave™CARE to register as a Medical device in US. The PEM Wave™CARE along with other medical devices that have applied PEMF technology is FDA class I, 510 (K) exempt safe and is a medical device that is proven to be effective. Thus, there will be no risks in selling this device after FDA registration.






We have invested an enormous amount of time and effort for
this project, and finally after seven years, it is completed for production. We
are so thankful for your participation and support. We provide an easy and safe
way to treat disease in the patients, suffering pain and health issues, with
little economic pressure.
You need not worry about the production process nor the
quality of our products. We will guarantee the best quality. We are cooperating
with medical experts in our factory within the Wonju Medical Device Center, an
advanced medical device facility operated by the local government of Korea.
Also, you need not worry about the remedial effects. The
PEMF treatment method has been used in medical clinics in the U.S. and Europe
for 60 years, and our method is a more advanced version of the existing PEMF
treatment.
With over 4 years of medical inspection of the treatment
effects of our device, we have finally acquired the best results. There are
already various devices in the market, using the PEMF method to relieve pain,
inflammation, sports injuries, insomnia, urinary incontinence, and menstrual
pain, and the U.S. FDA has approved their medicinal effects.
Using our innovative wearable technology, we will provide a
highly effective treatment, while minimizing the size of the conventional PEMF
treatment device.













We have completed the development of PEM Wave™CURE, which can cure 8 types of chronic diseases. We will reveal the PEM Wave™CURE after successfully ending this campaign. Since this medical device requires FDA class I or II clearance, it will take a long time to get it in the market. Thus, we desperately need your help. 
If you sign the preclinical research project for the PEM Wave™CURE at the next Indiegogo campaign, we will send you samples for preclinical research within 30 days. Your participation in the preclinical research data will dramatically decrease the time required for FDA clearance of PEM Wave™CURE. 
We hope for a new medical world, where people can save money on medical clinic fees and cure their chronic diseases themselves. PEM Wave™CURE has 8 illness treatment modes that are set for service. The participant can choose the treatment, according to personal needs and test it out himself.

< PEM Wave™CURE Preclinical Research List >







You Can Now Help Us Make A Difference.

We sincerely hope many people will live happier lives without pain from diseases and spend time and effort developing the PEM Wave™. 
Our first goal is to get funding through this campaign to collect money for production. However, more importantly, we hope to share this new wearable medical device with more people and develop it together. 


With your financial support, we will be able to:
- The costs regarding molding, GMP screening, and FDA registration for the manufacturing of the product.
- Align with medical researchers worldwide 
- Build a community for patients



We look forward to establishing
a new wellness lifestyle with your investment. Such a lifestyle will help the
patients readily treat their pains and diseases without any burdens.
We understand that it is very difficult to break the
frame of the existing medical treatment method. However, your participation in
this project will give you the chance to break from these inconvenient norms. 
We have long been making our
best efforts to complete this project. We sincerely hope that this innovative
device will be released into the world through your active support and
participation.The costs
regarding molding, GMP screening, and FDA registration for the manufacturing of
the product.






Who can use PEM Wave™CARE?

Virtually anyone who suffers from pain and stiffness associated with muscles, joints, arthritis, sprains and strains can use PEM Wave™CARE to treat their symptoms. Parental supervision is recommended for use on children under the age of 10.


Will I feel any pain during the treatment?NO. The pulsed electro-magnetic pulses can be adjusted to you individually so they do not hurt, however you will feel the pulsing of the magnetic current during treatment.

Is PEM Wave™CARE available internationally?It is our intention make PEM Wave™CARE available worldwide. As with all medical devices, PEM Wave™CARE will be subject to local regulation and requirements. 


When will my order ship? PEM Wave™CARE will be shipped once the campaign concludes, and  deliveries will be made in September 2016.

How can I reach Customer Service?PEM Wave™CARE comes with a one-year warranty.
What if I change my mind?During the campaign, the Indiegogo Support team can take care of all refund requests. Purchasers can contact support@indiegogo.com directly, before the campaign deadline, for prompt processing of all such requests. How can I reach Customer Service?PEM Wave™CARE comes with a one-year warranty.
What can I do if forget to pay shipping or miss the shipping address?Contact support@nautilus-lab.com
Don't see your question?Please email our Customer Care team email address at: support@nautilus-lab.com and somebody will get back to you as soon as possible.

DisclaimerDelivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

story:
About

My name is Justin Berry, Founder and Coach at BearFit Training Systems. I'm passionate about health, strength (both physical and mental) and the community that supports me. I've been fortunate enough to build my own business with the help of my friends and family, local sports teams, and the individual members who train with me. This campaign was created to help us finally move into our new location. By donating or pre-purchasing a membership or class package, you'll enable  us to:

  • Offset the costs of an expensive move.
    • Weights and equipment are heavy, right?
  • Help maintain existing and purchase additional equipment.
    • We are expanding from 1,000 sqft. to 3000 sqft. (Hello, turf area!)
  • Expand our membership and reach.

How can you help?

  • Make a donation. There's no amount too small.
  • Purchase a package. We are offering discounted rates so you'll get the chance to lock in cheaper annual prices. (These make great gifts as well!)
  • Most importantly, share this! 

The Impact

I train local athletes in their respective Football, Field Hockey, Volleyball, In/Outdoor Track and Field, Lacrosse, Ice Hockey, Wrestling, Baseball, Softball and Golf Clubs. Your support will continue to support not only our success, but more importantly their success - many whom are on track to become stars. Here's a few testimonials:

  • "I've never had a training session like this before. It's not your typical gym membership."
  • "I chose BearFit Training Systems because of all the positive referrals. The program exceeded my expectations -- I've never enjoyed working out until now."
  • "I never would have thought I could lift and squat this much weight and I feel so much stronger"
