story:
A Message From Jon

Hi everyone, my name is Jonathan White and I am the CEO of Hommage - a men's skincare and grooming brand dedicated to transforming stigmas around self-care for men. 

 

What Stigmas?

Although the men's skincare industry is changing for the better, there are still huge barriers thanks to mis-information and lack of education around grooming and skincare routines for men.  Guys don't talk to other guys about their skincare, leaving most consumers at the mercy of targeted advertising selling 'off-the-shelf' products, suggesting that one simple product can make you look 20 years younger (and are often disappointed when this isn't the case). Others are too overwhelmed by the vast array of offerings, all promising different results, to create a routine at all.

Our mission is to change this.

How? We make it simple.

 

Our Ethos

Hommage is about routine.

With 3 simple products we provide bespoke routines, tailored to your skin type, which we encourage you to adopt as rituals. Just 5 minutes in the morning and 5 at night for genuinely visible results. In addition to this, our premium skincare and grooming products encourage men to take a few moments out of their stressful lives to LOOK AFTER THEMSELVES! 

Hommage is striving to remove the guess-work by providing the information needed in a simple digital format. We don't push consumers to buy our products, we educate them to make the right choices whilst offering our combination of premium quality with effortless adoption.

 

Why Should You Care?

Well, despite the fact that the skin is the largest organ in your body, what lengths do you go to in order to build routine in the gym, at work or on your personal goals? I know many guys who spend thousands of pounds on gym membership a year and are relentless in their routine to build the body they desire, or spend hundreds (if not thousands!) on good quality suits, shirts and shoes to look after their appearance. But when it comes to skincare? £5 creams and lotions that do very little for your skin health other than loading it with surfactants and clogging pores. Why people? WHY?

I often get asked how I got into the industry, particularly given my more financially-focused background. To put it simply, I was one of those people. I never looked after my skin, I was overworked and constantly stressed, suffering from chronic Acne and, as a result, lack of confidence. I believed all the gender-based stigmas I know now to be truly dated - primarily that indulging in proper skincare was outside the realms of what was stereotypically “masculine”. None of my male friends (or so I thought) were doing it. I washed my face with soap and water convinced I was stripping it of all the 'bad' oils and pollution (the more the better).

How wrong I was. 

 

What We Discovered...

When we started on this journey, I was astonished at some of the feedback we were getting. When asking questions like "what made you choose your specific brands/products? ", I received many quotes like "always used it", "they marketed their product well", "it was just what I found off the shelf" - the list goes on...

What came out was fascinating and still drives me to this day. We have been gifted the ability to change the lives of other men like me for the better through a 'look good, feel good' principle, helping hundreds of men to take care of themselves through a small commitment to skin health during that 5 minutes of calm twice a day - cleansing and moisturising their skin.

The good news is that more men than ever are investing in their appearance (mostly privately), particularly when it comes to preserving youthful skin, and this is growing significantly year on year.

The fact is that skincare, like personal hygiene, is genderless.

 

Our Challenge

Despite the positive traction in the industry, the key problem remains a lack of personalised education. Whether that means what products to buy or what the benefits are of a more 'preventative' instead of 'reactive' approach (one of the most important topics we tell all of our customers).

 

How Can You Help?

Your investment in this instance will help us to expand and supercharge the Hommage mission, creating digital content that ‘normalises’ male skincare rituals, while expanding both our range, with new and innovative products, and our reach, allowing more customers to try and test our products.

Your reward for this...? The first step to exploring and restoring your own (or a loved one's) skin health through one essential routine. 

We developed these products for you, and the fact that a vast number of our customers switch to our optional subscription service is evidence, in itself, that they work. But we need your help to do more to make significant traction in the movement towards a better wellness routine for men. 

 

“Become a Tastemaker”

For those with an appetite for the very best Hommage has to offer, we have created The Ultimate Monaco Kit and introduced our new ‘Taste-Maker’ Programme. 

By opting for this kit, you are automatically invited to join and become instrumental in ensuring we continue to deliver the very best. 

We test and tweak our products relentlessly before making them available to the public. And who better to preview them than you? The very people whose desires we aim to fulfil. 

So, on top of receiving this specifically designed collection (which is not available as a package outside of Indiegogo) at a substantial discount, we would love to invite you to be part of the team, ensuring our quality meets your discerning standards.

Before any new product becomes available to the public, we will send you samples so that, should you choose, you can offer valued feedback, and we will listen.  

There is no obligation to do so but, at Hommage, we firmly believe that the people who are most invested in our success should have the opportunity to help shape our future.

We look forward to welcoming you on board.

 

                        ________________________________________________________________

 

Even if this particular project isn't for you, we would really appreciate your support in other ways by either donating to the cause or directing those who would benefit from our mission towards this campaign. 

Every little helps!

All the best, 

Jonathan White - CEO Hommage 

 

Customer Testimonials

 

Here is a snapshot of some of our verified customer testimonials. For more please feel free to visit our website. 

“Great quality skincare products for men, perfect for my dry skin, no skin irritation now.” - Simoash A. using Skincare Sample Pack

“This is a very good quality product and would definitely buy again.” - Gary R. using Shave Cream: Perform

"I've used a number of different brands over the years and I can honestly say this is the best one. It has made a noticeable difference since I've started using it." - Jon C. using Eye Serum: Awaken.

"The best kit there is, I have tried several other brands of cleansers and moisturizers and I have found this to be top notch! The kit makes it very simple to follow a facial hygiene program."- Josh N. using Face Care Subscription Plan

"I have used this product for 3 years, after shaving in the mornings and before bed at night. It smells amazing and leaves my skin soft and doesn't get oily." - Viv W. using Face Moisturizer: Fortify

"I was impressed both, the Short time of delivery and meanwhile the good-looking and nice wrapping of the products. The quality of the products is, of course, outstanding, meaning I was and continue to be a loyal and completely satisfied user of HOMAGE. Many thanks! Hb" - Branda H. using Skincare Gift Set

"The Face Cleanser "Core Cleanser" is phenomenal!! It is light and refreshing and has their signature "Monaco" scent. This product is a great product in a line of great products!!!! This face cleanser is gentle but cleans extremely well and smells great!! What more can a guy want!!"  - James Q. using Face Cleanser: Purify

"Of all the face cleansers I’ve ever used this is the cleanest and lightest feeling. It doesn’t feel like anything is left over it does a good job of clearing your face. I have way less blemishes as well." - T.J.B using Face Cleanser: Purify

"I received the Hommage products through an on line men's box subscription service. Eye serum, facial cleaner and the face moisturizer. All three were outstanding, quality products. I use the cleaner and moisturizer daily. The moisturizer was the smaller 28ml size that just won't empty after what has to be at least a couple months of daily use already. That said, it is due to be used up soon (I think??) so I proactively ordered this 120ml size which for the price point is awesome (getting what will be more than three smaller bottles for the better, discounted price overall). I'm glad I was presented with this introduction to Hommage and expect to be a long-time customer! Tell your friends!" - Joe using Face Moisturiser: Fortify, Face Cleanser: Purify and Eye Serum: Awaken

"Great Product, I keep on reordering it!" - Louis S. using Gentle Face Cleanser: Balance

"This is the best I have ever used" - George S using Face Moisturizer: Fortify

 

The Essential Routine

 

3 essential steps, 1 powerful routine. All it takes is consistency and dedication to the cause.

Step 1: Cleanse

Apply lukewarm water to the face to prime the skin and act as a lather. Using 2 pumps and your fingers, massage gently onto the face and neck covering all areas where oil and dirt can build up (including behind the ears).  Massage in a circular motion at least 5 times in each area (depending on the build-up of oil this can be more). Wash thoroughly with lukewarm water to clear the skin. Pat gently with a clean dry towel.

Tip - Imagine your face is covered in mud and you had to wash it off. Dirt and pollution may not be visible but it's there! 

Step 2: Fortify

Apply 2 pumps (more in harsher weather conditions or if you suffer from dry skin) to your fingers and massage gently to the face and neck making sure to distribute to all exposed areas (avoiding under eyes).

Tip - This moisturiser is designed to lock in moisture and protect your skin from the elements so make sure you especially protect the vulnerable areas.

Step 3: Awaken

Apply 1-2 pumps to your finger and gently dab onto the skin under each eye. The skin under your eyes is amongst the thinnest so be careful not to disrupt the cells (which can lead to more dark circles).

Tip - Try using your third finger (ring finger) when applying the eye serum, it has the lightest touch and is therefore less likely to cause further damage. And make sure you allow the products to dry before facing the elements.

Further information on our Essential Face Care Kit can be found below...

 

 

Let's Get Social

 

Our Guarantee

If you’re not satisfied with your purchase for any reason, you’re free to send it back for a full refund within the first 30 days. Because of our high success rate, our only request is that you first allow us to consult and advise you on the product use and application guidelines. Our goal isn’t to just sell a product but to help people find real, lasting results to their skin health. We’d love the opportunity to help you too!

 

Timeline

Hommage products will be ready to be shipped in the first week of June. Order any time and start your journey towards better skin health.


If you are outside the United Kingdom or United States, customs fees and duties may be required in order to obtain your order. Customs and duties are the responsibility of the buyer. We have no control over how long it takes for international orders to arrive. Please note that many international orders will be routed through a country other than that of its final destination. This is normal and is done to ensure a more secure delivery internationally.

 

Risks and Challenges

Over the past few years we have worked tirelessly to ensure a smooth and consistent supply chain of our products to ensure orders are shipped as soon as possible without delays. Due to COVID-19 and the current state of logistics services worldwide there is an increased risk to this supply chain, however we promise to communicate any delays to this service as soon as possible to meet your expectations safely and securely.

I know many guys who spend thousands of pounds on gym membership a year and are relentless in their routine to build the body they desire, or spend hundreds (if not thousands!) on good quality suits, shirts and shoes to look after their appearance. But when it comes to skincare? £5 creams and lotions that do very little for your skin health other than loading it with surfactants and clogging pores. Why people? WHY?I often get asked how I got into the industry, particularly given my more financially-focused background. To put it simply, I was one of those people. I never looked after my skin, I was overworked and constantly stressed, suffering from chronic Acne and, as a result, lack of confidence. I believed all the gender-based stigmas I know now to be truly dated - primarily that indulging in proper skincare was outside the realms of what was stereotypically “masculine”. None of my male friends (or so I thought) were doing it. I washed my face with soap and water convinced I was stripping it of all the 'bad' oils and pollution (the more the better).How wrong I was.  What We Discovered...When we started on this journey, I was astonished at some of the feedback we were getting. When asking questions like "what made you choose your specific brands/products? ", I received many quotes like "always used it", "they marketed their product well", "it was just what I found off the shelf" - the list goes on...What came out was fascinating and still drives me to this day. We have been gifted the ability to change the lives of other men like me for the better through a 'look good, feel good' principle, helping hundreds of men to take care of themselves through a small commitment to skin health during that 5 minutes of calm twice a day - cleansing and moisturising their skin.The good news is that more men than ever are investing in their appearance (mostly privately), particularly when it comes to preserving youthful skin, and this is growing significantly year on year.The fact is that skincare, like personal hygiene, is genderless. Our ChallengeDespite the positive traction in the industry, the key problem remains a lack of personalised education. Whether that means what products to buy or what the benefits are of a more 'preventative' instead of 'reactive' approach (one of the most important topics we tell all of our customers). How Can You Help?Your investment in this instance will help us to expand and supercharge the Hommage mission, creating digital content that ‘normalises’ male skincare rituals, while expanding both our range, with new and innovative products, and our reach, allowing more customers to try and test our products.Your reward for this...? The first step to exploring and restoring your own (or a loved one's) skin health through one essential routine. We developed these products for you, and the fact that a vast number of our customers switch to our optional subscription service is evidence, in itself, that they work. But we need your help to do more to make significant traction in the movement towards a better wellness routine for men.  “Become a Tastemaker”For those with an appetite for the very best Hommage has to offer, we have created The Ultimate Monaco Kit and introduced our new ‘Taste-Maker’ Programme. By opting for this kit, you are automatically invited to join and become instrumental in ensuring we continue to deliver the very best. We test and tweak our products relentlessly before making them available to the public. And who better to preview them than you? The very people whose desires we aim to fulfil. So, on top of receiving this specifically designed collection (which is not available as a package outside of Indiegogo) at a substantial discount, we would love to invite you to be part of the team, ensuring our quality meets your discerning standards.Before any new product becomes available to the public, we will send you samples so that, should you choose, you can offer valued feedback, and we will listen.  There is no obligation to do so but, at Hommage, we firmly believe that the people who are most invested in our success should have the opportunity to help shape our future.We look forward to welcoming you on board.                         ________________________________________________________________ Even if this particular project isn't for you, we would really appreciate your support in other ways by either donating to the cause or directing those who would benefit from our mission towards this campaign. Every little helps!All the best, Jonathan White - CEO Hommage  Customer Testimonials Here is a snapshot of some of our verified customer testimonials. For more please feel free to visit our website. “Great quality skincare products for men, perfect for my dry skin, no skin irritation now.” - Simoash A. using Skincare Sample Pack“This is a very good quality product and would definitely buy again.” - Gary R. using Shave Cream: Perform"I've used a number of different brands over the years and I can honestly say this is the best one. It has made a noticeable difference since I've started using it." - Jon C. using Eye Serum: Awaken."The best kit there is, I have tried several other brands of cleansers and moisturizers and I have found this to be top notch! The kit makes it very simple to follow a facial hygiene program."- Josh N. using Face Care Subscription Plan"I have used this product for 3 years, after shaving in the mornings and before bed at night. It smells amazing and leaves my skin soft and doesn't get oily." - Viv W. using Face Moisturizer: Fortify"I was impressed both, the Short time of delivery and meanwhile the good-looking and nice wrapping of the products. The quality of the products is, of course, outstanding, meaning I was and continue to be a loyal and completely satisfied user of HOMAGE. Many thanks! Hb" - Branda H. using Skincare Gift Set"The Face Cleanser "Core Cleanser" is phenomenal!! It is light and refreshing and has their signature "Monaco" scent. This product is a great product in a line of great products!!!! This face cleanser is gentle but cleans extremely well and smells great!! What more can a guy want!!"  - James Q. using Face Cleanser: Purify"Of all the face cleansers I’ve ever used this is the cleanest and lightest feeling. It doesn’t feel like anything is left over it does a good job of clearing your face. I have way less blemishes as well." - T.J.B using Face Cleanser: Purify"I received the Hommage products through an on line men's box subscription service. Eye serum, facial cleaner and the face moisturizer. All three were outstanding, quality products. I use the cleaner and moisturizer daily. The moisturizer was the smaller 28ml size that just won't empty after what has to be at least a couple months of daily use already. That said, it is due to be used up soon (I think??) so I proactively ordered this 120ml size which for the price point is awesome (getting what will be more than three smaller bottles for the better, discounted price overall). I'm glad I was presented with this introduction to Hommage and expect to be a long-time customer! Tell your friends!" - Joe using Face Moisturiser: Fortify, Face Cleanser: Purify and Eye Serum: Awaken"Great Product, I keep on reordering it!" - Louis S. using Gentle Face Cleanser: Balance"This is the best I have ever used" - George S using Face Moisturizer: Fortify The Essential Routine
 
3 essential steps, 1 powerful routine. All it takes is consistency and dedication to the cause.Step 1: CleanseApply lukewarm water to the face to prime the skin and act as a lather. Using 2 pumps and your fingers, massage gently onto the face and neck covering all areas where oil and dirt can build up (including behind the ears).  Massage in a circular motion at least 5 times in each area (depending on the build-up of oil this can be more). Wash thoroughly with lukewarm water to clear the skin. Pat gently with a clean dry towel.Tip - Imagine your face is covered in mud and you had to wash it off. Dirt and pollution may not be visible but it's there! Step 2: FortifyApply 2 pumps (more in harsher weather conditions or if you suffer from dry skin) to your fingers and massage gently to the face and neck making sure to distribute to all exposed areas (avoiding under eyes).Tip - This moisturiser is designed to lock in moisture and protect your skin from the elements so make sure you especially protect the vulnerable areas.Step 3: AwakenApply 1-2 pumps to your finger and gently dab onto the skin under each eye. The skin under your eyes is amongst the thinnest so be careful not to disrupt the cells (which can lead to more dark circles).Tip - Try using your third finger (ring finger) when applying the eye serum, it has the lightest touch and is therefore less likely to cause further damage. And make sure you allow the products to dry before facing the elements.Further information on our Essential Face Care Kit can be found below...  Let's Get Social Our GuaranteeIf you’re not satisfied with your purchase for any reason, you’re free to send it back for a full refund within the first 30 days. Because of our high success rate, our only request is that you first allow us to consult and advise you on the product use and application guidelines. Our goal isn’t to just sell a product but to help people find real, lasting results to their skin health. We’d love the opportunity to help you too! TimelineHommage products will be ready to be shipped in the first week of June. Order any time and start your journey towards better skin health.If you are outside the United Kingdom or United States, customs fees and duties may be required in order to obtain your order. Customs and duties are the responsibility of the buyer. We have no control over how long it takes for international orders to arrive. Please note that many international orders will be routed through a country other than that of its final destination. This is normal and is done to ensure a more secure delivery internationally. Risks and ChallengesOver the past few years we have worked tirelessly to ensure a smooth and consistent supply chain of our products to ensure orders are shipped as soon as possible without delays. Due to COVID-19 and the current state of logistics services worldwide there is an increased risk to this supply chain, however we promise to communicate any delays to this service as soon as possible to meet your expectations safely and securely.

story:
Smart Meat Thermometer You Only Dream About

Why does meat temperature matter?  

Any person, having some idea of ins and outs of meat cooking process, knows full well that taste and quality of a meat dish depend pretty much on how you cook it. Yes, it’s also important to choose a right slab of meat, to process it in a right way, to use proper spices and to make appropriate marinade sauce.

 

Still, control over the temperature inside the meat plays a major role in proper cooking. You see, different kinds of meat feature their own cooking temperature, at which all malignant bacteria are destroyed, while vitamins and taste are preserved. For a medium beef steak the temperature is about 150°F and a well-done steak requires more than 160°F.

Lamb tastes perfect when cooked at 185°F, while pork reveals its best flavor at 195°F. And to get delicious dishes from chicken or poultry you need the highest temperature, about 200°F. And what is the way to determine the perfect moment, when your meat is ready? How can you be sure it’s neither dried nor raw?

In the old-fashioned way you should take a knife, cut the meat and check its color and toughness. But it’s much more convenient to use a meat thermometer that shows precise temperature inside your meat.

 Especially if you are about to make fish dishes...

 

There are meat thermometers and there is iProbe

Yes, many of us use different types of meat thermometers to facilitate cooking process. But most of the thermometers, both mechanical and electronic, are not able to solve one great problem – they can’t relieve you from the necessity to constantly have an eye on the temperature they’re showing. None of the standard meat thermometers is capable of informing you about the moment when the inside temperature of the meat has amounted up the needed parameter, and that it is time to take the dish out of the oven or grill. 

 As a result, you have to stay in the kitchen or to haunt about the grill monitoring the process. You have no chance to leave your meal unattended and to join your family or friends in order to spend some time in their company. Sure, you may try, but then there is the risk that all the efforts to cook perfect meat will be in vain, since you can easily miss the right moment for taking the dish out. Is there any solution that can free you from the burden of watching meat while cooking it?

Yes, now you get iProbe that is strikingly different from usual meat thermometers due to the use of advanced wireless technologies. It combines an electronic heat probe and a clever app that is downloaded to your smartphone, and completely changes your view of cooking process. You just need to insert the probe into the meat, to specify the required temperature via the app and to put the dish into the oven. You will get a message through your smartphone when the inside temperature run up the figures specified by you. 

Voila, you do not need to watch the meal and it always reaches the desired degree of doneness without being dried or burnt. You are a super chef and can cook meat as good as it’s cooked in the first class restaurants!

Step-by-step – how it works

Prepare a cut of meat you are going to cook.  

Take the probe out of the block and launch the application on your smartphone. The app supports iOS and Android based devices.

Specify the kind of meat, the size of the cut and the necessary doneness via the app.

Insert the probe into the meat keeping in mind that it should be placed as close to the center of the cut as possible. It is important for the accuracy of the temperature measurement to place the thermometer tip right in the heart of the cut, in its thickest part. If there is a bone in the meat, the tip should not come into contact with it. Then place the meat into the oven or on the grill leaving the probe to measure both inside and ambient temperature. In fact, iProbe features two temperature sensors, internal and external (the latter is designed for smoking and barbecue). 

During the cooking target, inside and outside temperatures are displayed via the app.

The electronics inside the probe transmits data on the block, which, in turn, passes the information to the smartphone via your home Wi-Fi router. This cloud connection acts anywhere within the router coverage.

Due to it, as soon as the inside temperature gets to the specified figures, the app will inform you via the smartphone by vibration, sound and message.

Just take your meat out of the oven and savor the delicious taste of the restaurant quality food!

10 Unbeaten advantages of iProbe

It is cheaper than to have dinner at a nice restaurant, even if you add the expenses for purchasing meat to its cost. And you save more than once since now you can enjoy perfectly cooked dishes every day instead of spending the budget for restaurants several times a month. iProbe with food iProbe with food You get the opportunity to accurately cook different types of meat such as tender chicken, juicy beef, smoked pork and even grilled fish. It is not a problem to cook steaks of any doneness starting from rare to well done. 

Note that the application allows you to choose both a type of meat and a size of the cut to make cooking more accurate. Having the outside sensor in addition to the internal one.

iProbe is unbeatable for those types of food processing which require monitoring the temperature around the meals, like smoking. 

Eventually, you need only one thermometer instead of two. It is so easy-to-use, accurate in measurements and thoughtfully designed that even a person with minimal cooking skills will be able to achieve striking results every time when using iProbe. 

Almost no culinary experience is needed to impress your family or friends by your excellent meals. This innovative meat thermometer solves a major problem for you – you do not need to spend the time on just watching cooking process. You are free to join your friends, to watch TV, to play with children or to cook something else, staying assured that Iprobe monitors the temperature for you and will let you know about the end of the cooking just in time. Leave the meat in the oven and go doing other things. You can be master of your time, because Iprobe is able to calculate the approximate time of cooking, depending on the specified parameters. The app will inform you about how much time you have, so you can spend it, for example, for making some sauce or salad to the main course. 

There is no way to miss the notification as several kinds of signal are used, including a visual message, sound and vibration. In addition, you may configure the application to send the notification to some of your friends or family members you can rely on. Even if you're really engaged in something, you will not miss the moment. Don’t forget about resting! If you leave your meat in the oven for resting, it can become dry. To keep the meat juicy, allow iProbe to monitor the temperature, and it let you know when the resting reaches its goal. 

The wireless solution has a great advantage over wire meat thermometers since the wires don’t get on your way and you may not bother that water, high temperature or physical impact can damage them. The probe wire doesn’t allow to completely cover the food during cooking, which eliminates the possibility to use certain types of heat treatment, for example, Sous Vide. In addition, the wires get dirty and it is quite difficult to clean them from grease and traces of smoke, while the wireless thermometer is easy to clean and to store.

All electronics are hidden within the thermometer and protected by a covering withstanding ambient temperature up to 375°F and internal temperature up to 165°F. This is an accurate, reliable, durable and compact meat thermometer designed with the help of the latest technology. You can choose the best iProbe option for you! It is available in two variants of sets and in five colors: conservative black, naturally beige, delicate pink, soft gray and pure white. 

Solo option includes a probe and a charger made of metal and wood with magnetic rear on the charger to provide the possibility of attaching the device to any metal surface in your kitchen. It is powered by one AAA battery and features LED indicator displaying a pairing status and battery characteristics. 

A set of four probes is added by a block with an OLED display, a touch screen, a speaker and a charger powered by two AA batteries. The block can be comfortably placed on any flat surface in the kitchen and allows managing the device and receiving sound notifications without using a smartphone. Due to four probes in the set you can cook several meals at different temperatures simultaneously.

Design and color variations

iProbe is a smart device with a wide range of options for customization. Its stylish design perfectly fits modern kitchen environment. It is really useful and allows you freedom while providing the best results over and over again – all you have to do is to reap the benefits!

Packaging variations

Schedule

 Using iProbe in your kitchen, you will achieve perfection in cooking

Help us back this project and your meat will never be a shame!

story:
Guerreros Teotihuacan Soccer School

Guerreros Teotihuacan A.C. is a Mexican federally registered non-profit foundation located in Teotihuacan in central Mexico. Based close to the 2000 year old pyramids, our primary goal is to foster indigenous identity and consciousness in children and youth, girls and boys, through the practice of sports and physical activity, as well as cultural and artistic activities. At the center of our mission is a soccer school that daily welcomes up to 60 children of all ages and teaches them about core values that will help them in life: honesty, respect, self-discipline, compassion and community.  We need your help to get these amazing kids to Acapulco for an International Soccer tournament!

You can help make the team’s dream a reality!

The Guerreros Teotihuacan soccer school competes regularly in local and regional leagues and tournaments, giving children on the school’s teams the opportunity to grow and improve their self-confidence, as well as broaden their perspective through exchange with children from other teams and towns in the region. This summer, from July 15 to 21, the school is excited to take the children a bit further afield for the first time.  We are headed to an International Soccer Tournament in Acapulco – the Copa Acapulco – for children aged 11-12!  The kids are beyond excited by the prospect – none of them have ever had the opportunity to travel that far from home.  This will also be a unique chance to meet kids from teams from all over Mexico, as well as from the U.S. and Central America. Our goal with this experience is not only that the kids get a chance to compete and realize how amazing they are, but also that their vision opens to future possibilities in their lives through this kind of sports/cultural exchange – the sky is the limit!

What We Need

We are fundraising to make sure this dream can become a reality, because the children participating are low income and already making a huge effort to attend training and regular season games. We need help for tournament registration costs, transport from Teotihuacan to Acapulco, as well as transport while there to games and events. We also need help for hotel and meal costs, as well as uniforms.  We estimate the total of these costs to be around $3500 that will cover all expenses for 15-20 children and their coach and assistant coach. 

Dreaming Beyond the Acapulco Tournament

Any funds raised in excess of the immediate needs of the tournament will go into the general funds of the Guerreros Teotihuacan A.C. nonprofit foundation, to be used for other exciting opportunities for the kids.  Some of the needs are very basic - there are a number of children whose economic situation doesn't allow them to cover even the very low cost of the daily training program, so we provide them with full scholarships so that it is possible for them to participate in all the same opportunities.  We have also recently made an arrangement with a coach from one of Mexico City's professional teams ("America") to come out to Teotihuacan once a week to provide a new level of vision and experience to the kids. Our most exciting project, for which we are also fundraising, is a plan to take 2 children per year to the United States on an all-expense paid scholarship trip to a soccer camp or cultural exchange.  We are so excited to be developing these plans and meeting these goals with your generous help!

story:
Hello! My name is Mike Salguero. I'm a health nut that spent the last 6 years running a company connecting craftsmen with individuals wanting something unique. I recently discovered a new problem: today's beef. I've been working with my team to bring America a better beef. We invite you to join us in this journey back to nature - it's gonna taste good.

Because we had such a smashing success on Kickstarter, we decided to share ButcherBox with you and the rest of the Indiegogo community! 



Consumer Reports recommends you avoid conventionally raised beef from feedlots and instead eat 100% grass-fed beef.

  • "The majority of beef (about 97 percent) for sale comes from “conventionally raised” cattle that begin their lives grazing in grassy pastures but are then shipped to and packed into feedlots. That practice is considered to be the most cost-efficient way to fatten up cattle."
  • "In the feedlot corn and soy are the primary foods. But the cows may also be fed candy, chicken coop waste, and the slaughterhouse remains of pigs and chickens."
  • "One of the most significant findings of our research is that beef from conventionally raised cows was more likely (2X) to have bacteria overall, as well as bacteria that are resistant to antibiotics, than beef from sustainably raised cows (grass-fed)."

  • Only 1% of the total beef produced in the United States is 100% grass-fed.
  • 100% grass-fed farms lack the resources necessary to advertise and distribute their beef.

As a result it's impossible for most people to get 100% grass-fed beef and the few who can are often confused with supermarket labels or limited to just ground beef. Just because a label says grass-fed doesn't mean it's 100% grass-fed beef (all cattle are grass-fed to start!).

Knowing where your beef comes from is no longer a 'nice to know', it's a 'need to know'.

Grass-fed beef delivered to your door for ~$7/meal

We've spent endless hours identifying and partnering with the best sources for 100% grass-fed beef. And we're proud to say that you now have a beef free of the bad and full of the good! 

What's in the Box?

Each box comes with a highly curated selection of 100% grass-fed beef cuts. For example, a box might come with top sirloin cuts, short ribs, ground beef, and sirloin tips. There's 15 - 20 individual meals worth of meat in every box at 6 - 8 oz portion sizes. To tell you exactly what's coming might ruin the surprise and nobody likes the guy who ruins the surprise. Your box will arrive within just 7 days of ordering!

You get the cuts and the recipes to cook like a pro

We chose popular cuts that we know you'll love cooking, as well as a few of our personal favorites. You'll also enjoy our step-by-step recipe cards that provide you with everything you'll need to deliver a perfect meal.

Think of us as the neighborhood butcher for modern America

Our goal is to make 100% grass-fed beef more accessible than ever before. We are working with industry experts to provide you with the best products and a simple ordering system. 

Your support will allow us to offer more types of meat and spread the 'back to nature' movement across America. 

By redeeming one of our rewards you're not locked into an ongoing monthly subscription. After you receive your shipment, you can become a monthly ButcherBox member if you'd like!



Frequently Asked Questions

How much meat comes in the box?

7 -10 lbs depending on the selection of cuts. There's enough meat for 15 - 20 individual meals at 6 - 8 oz portion sizes. 

When will my box arrive?

Your box will arrive within 7 days of ordering on Indiegogo. We don't ship on Thursdays or Fridays because we don't want the box arriving on the weekend. Email us if you have questions: support@getbutcherbox.com

Is this a one-time purchase or am I put into an ongoing membership?

Your purchase on Indiegogo is a one-time purchase, however you'll have the option of joining ButcherBox as a monthly member if you'd like and we'd love to have you!

So you choose what meat I receive monthly?

Yes. Our team spends countless hours curating the individual boxes you receive monthly. We choose the best possible combinations while ensuring a wide variety of high quality meats.  

If I choose a multi-month perk can I change what type of meat I receive for future months? 

Yes. If for example you got a 6 month (all beef) perk but later decided that you wanted beef and organic chicken we can edit your membership at anytime. 

Where do you source your meat from?

All of our meat is sourced from various farms in the Midwest. We have partnered with amazing farms who are revolutionizing the grass-fed industry. Our meat is of the highest quality.

Can you ship to Hawaii or Alaska?

Yes, but it costs an additional $25/month to help cover shipping costs. For example, if you select a 3 month membership then you'd need to add $75 to the $369 perk price. So your price would be $444. 

How will my meat arrive?

Our meat is flash frozen at the peak of freshness and individually packaged. These packages are then separated based on cut type into cardboard boxes. The cardboard boxes are then packaged into a styrofoam box filled with dry ice. Once your box arrives, you will be able to take the cardboard boxes out of the styrofoam box and place the individual packages directly into your freezer.

Will my meat be fresh upon arrival?

All of our boxes are packaged with a specific amount of dry ice. The amount of dry ice is carefully calculated based on your geographic location. The dry ice may be completely evaporated by the time the box arrives at your house, but your meat should still be frozen or cold to the touch. The box can sit outside for 12-24 hours, so just make sure to bring it inside that day and refrigerate/freeze. 

Can I specify a delivery date for my box?

Yes, after purchasing your perk, just email us instructions: support@getbutcherbox.com

Does somebody need to be at home to accept delivery?

No. Our boxes do not require a signature upon delivery, however, we do recommend that you bring your box inside as soon as you can to ensure maximum freshness and high quality. Please let us know if you have any special requests for delivery.

Other Questions?

We'd love to help! Just send us a note and we'll respond asap.

support@getbutcherbox.com

story:
Our Story

We are Carnegie Mellon University's premiere Quidditch team, the CMU Marauders!


"Wait," we hear you saying, "I thought Quidditch was the sport Harry Potter plays. Don't they fly around on broomsticks?"


Yes! But six years ago, a Muggle (non-magical) version of Quidditch was founded at Middlebury College, and we are joining a group of 100+ colleges around the nation who have established Quidditch teams. (Check out InternationalQuidditch.org for more about Quidditch.)


Our team was founded Spring 2011, but it really kicked off this semester. We have a club that practices and scrimmages every Friday, and we also have a competitive team of 12 who will be heading to the Quidditch World Cup in New York City this November!


*Video will be up in the next week!

What We Need

As a fledgling organization, we are struggling to get funds from the university. That's why we need your help! Our estimates put costs for the Quidditch World Cup at $250 per player. That's more than any of us can afford, but we are determined to get there and represent our school and our love of the game! We hope to raise $100 for each of our 12 players. This money will be used to pay for our transportation from Pittsburgh to New York and back, as well as secure us lodging in the City. (Unlike the wizards of Harry Potter, we are not allowed to take portkeys and camp out in magical tents.) Any little bit helps us in meeting this ambitious goal, so please, share this with your friends and family, anyone who might be willing to help a group of determined college students out - or maybe they just get a kick out of Muggle Quidditch! Any funds raised beyond our goal will be put to good use, purchasing much-needed equipment for our practices and scrimmages.

story:
Our Story

Hello friends! We are a group of five high school students that attend the middle college program at College of San Mateo. We were assigned to raise money for an organization that will help society or the world. We believe that healthcare is on the low, that is why our group chose to raise money for a free clinic. Given the ability that we have using this website, we wish to raise $400. We are hoping  to donate the $400 to the San Francisco Free Clinic, sffc.org. They provide preventive health care, cancer and heart disease screening, Diabetes care, Vaccinations, Treatment of non-emergency acute and chronic medical problems, Yoga for health and mental well-being. The San Francisco Free Clinic was created in 1993 by two family physicians that realized, many people who don't have healthcare go without any medical care.

The Impact

Our campaign will impact the lives of people in San Francisco whom cannot afford healthcare. In the case that our campaign doesn't work, the clinic won't get the money, then they wont be able to buy supplies, so then they can't help the patients and they could potentially die. When we raise the money for the clinic we will give them the opportunity to buy supplies to treat  patients and keep the clinic running.


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal given to us by our teachers is $400, but that doesn't matter when we are trying to help save peoples lives, raising more than $400 would be amazing! By donating money you will get the satisfaction of giving people less fortunate, the chance to stay healthy and live a better life. How much more rewarding can it get?

Other Ways You Can Help

You can't do more than give what you can. You can always visit the Free Clinic's website to see what else you can do to contribute.

story:
Balance any and all chakras with the magnetron device.

                                     

Just a 15 minute workout a day, will do more for you mentally, physically,and spiritually than any system on the market right now.

 

 

                                Tantric Yoga

 Tantra means continuous or ongoing loom (union) and is in reference to energy transfer within a cycle. As an individual this concept can be displayed in meditations such as the micro and macro cosmic orbit. Within a relationship it is the ongoing transfer of energy between intimate partners.

 

                                   Love conquers all

                       

 

It is well known that love is one of the highest emotional frequencies of energy-with this in mind, it is no wonder that intimacy with two intuned partners is the fastest way to enlightenment and ultimate health.

                                                 

                       

                                How love heals the body:

True love cannot be expressed with words, formulas or equations, as an alchemist ive worked painstakingly trying to figure out the natural essence of the phenomina known as love. There is a chemical mixture of hormones present with ability to keep you younger looking, healthier, happy, more energetic.

  1. enhanced dopamine (relaxation)
  2. more seratonin in the blood stream (feel good chemical)
  3. increased Human Growth Hormone (more efficient cell regeneration)
  4. Lymphocytes (heals and fights infections)
  5. Norepinephrine (raised energy level)
  6. Testosterone (burns fat, builds muscle tissue, increases desire & stamina)
  7. Triiodothyronine (helps to regulate metabolism)            

                              

 Above are some of the major hormones present, when love is experienced. Being that everything is in constant flux, moving further away from balance. Below is the invention of an all-natural magnetic device with the power to place your body in a hieghtened state of joy, health and positive growth.

                                      

                                                Natural Magnetic Healing

Attract all that you want out of life-Nothing attracts better than a magnet.

                          

The Earth serves as a giant magnet and supports over 9 billion people with shelter, sustenance, medicinal herbs, water, and all that we use everyday. It only makes sense that a device capable of transformong your life for the better; utilizes natural magnetic technology.

 

 

 

      An all in one in home device for overall improvement.          

                   Now with vibration feature!

-allowing you to get even more of a workout while sitting or standing still!

When a magnetron is pressed against your base or sacral chakra, it aligns the poles of your blood cells; not only allowing for better transfer of blood, oxygen and nutrients, but a higher release of the hormones which give us energy, drive, more focus, and help to keep us youger longer.

Rather your wearing the magnetron in meditation or doing the in home work out it will help burn fat, improve libido, and bring an overall healthier more exciting life.

                Kegal exersize w/ magnetron attached near belly button.

This product is for men and women, although the below diagram represents the female reproductive system.

                             

  • Kegal exersizes improve hormonal balance
  • hieghtens sensation and duration during intimacy
  • regulates menstrual cycle
  • fights off stagnation & infection in the pelvic area
  • keeps all the lower organs and parts tight and youthful
  • relieves inconsistent urination
  • Helps prevent  and treat cists and cancer's
     in the ovaries and skene gland for wemon
  • A great treatment for endometriosis
  • helps prevent prostate Cancer in men.
  • Helps burn fat and build muscle

                                                

                                    

 

"May your food and drink, be your medicine"

                                               -Socrates

 

                               Serenitea all natural herbal green tea blend.

           

                             Serenitea, all natural herbal green tea blend

                                           

                                 

cinnamon, cloves, high grade green tea, rosemary,thyme, spearmint and gogi berries are just a few of the natural antioxidant rich, anti-inflammatory, anti-mutagin, blood cleansing ingrediants, which make this delicious tea blend, the closests drink to the mythical elixer of immortality.

                                                                

When you help support this campaign you recieve perks which will help you balance and ascend your current life and state of mind/ body.

You will learn how to get the best results when it comes to eating, and working out.

As I am an inventor always looking for new and improved ways to help other's. A large portion of contributions go to research and innovative developement. 

 I have trained and helped heal over a thousand individuals over the last 6 years. Evolution is the product of a dire need; and with a need for me to help more people I developed this new system, therefore you do not have to come to my gym in order to reap the benefits of what I offer, but instead you can get the results you desire in less than 15 minutes of your time, just 3 days a week.

Even if you are not in a current situation to contribute to this campaign, you can help by recycling, engaging in non-profit work, spreading the word and remaining a positive individual in this world.

Thank you, For taking the time to read about and help a heartfelt dream to help improve self, other's, and the world in which we live.

story:
Hello everyone, I’m Johnny Mallon.

 

If you’re a golf fan, imagine how you'd feel if you had helped British Open Champion Darren Clarke to start his career, or imagine if you’d played an important part in Rory McElroy’s phenomenal success.

 

So, even if you’re not a golf fan, what a claim to fame that would be.

 

Well… here’s your chance to help launch my career and follow in the footsteps of all Irish golf champions.

 

…And better still, you’ll be rewarded for your help.

 

 

 

I’m a professional golfer from Ireland.

I’m working towards becoming a European and  PGA Tour Player and with your help I’m raising $26,000 to fund the first step of the journey.

 

I’m giving every one of you fantastic

rewards for your contributions.

 

For example, how would you like to take 3 of your friends and join me at major tournament with VIP access..., rubbing shoulders with the worlds golfing stars, like Tiger Woods or Lee Westwood…

…or, be my caddie for the day at a European or PGA Tour event...

…or own a Tour golf bag from my first Year on Tour…

…I’m also giving you my personal coaching advice to improve your golf swing, and giving you private and personal monthly updates to build on your progress…

…And, I’m giving every single one of you something very unique and personal.

 

Check out all the rewards on the right-hand side of your screen.


 

 

So why does a professional golfer like me

need funding to reach the top level?

 

Well… if you’re not already familiar with the process,

here’s how it works:

 

All Pro golfers need funding to take their first steps towards the big time. This sponsorship money pays for travel, hotel and food, and entry fees to tournaments. Without funding a Pro golfer wouldn’t be able to attend and play in these tournaments.

 

Traditionally most young Pro golfers got their funding from local business, or friends and family.

But, today’s tough economy means local sponsors are almost non-existent.

 

Just think…what will happen to the game if young professional golfers don’t have the chance to break through to the top level…what if we had never had the chance to enjoy Rory McElroy, Darren Clarke, Tiger Woods, or Ernie Els?

 

So I’m determined to break through and 

achieve my goals so I need your help.

 

After all, it’s the regular everyday golfers that keep the sport alive, and your interest in the sport that turns major players into household names.

 


Here’s how your contributions will be used:

 

From April, the money will be used to enter and attend various tournaments on the Europro Tour and Jamega Tour.

 

Your funding will pay for the entry fees, and 

travel and accommodation for all of these events.

 

My aim is that the winnings from these tournaments will fund my next step to move up the ranks in September this year, which means I would be a member of the Challenge Tour from January 2013.

A good performance here means I automatically qualify for the “European Tour”….and that’s the top level.

 

So how do you know if I’m any good?


Well, here’s the story so far:

 

·      I started playing at age 10

·      Darren Clarke spotted my potential and paid my sponsorship to The Sports Academy at age 18  (www.thesportsacademy.org)

·      At The Sports Academy I was selected for the UK team to play Spain in a Ryder Cup style 3 day tournament…I was the highest scoring player on the tournament

·      I was the first player ever to be voted Junior and Senior Player of the Year in the same year, at my club, Dungannon Golf Club, where Darren Clarke started his career

·      First time attending Europro tour school at 20 years old, I qualified 3rd out of 116 players

·      That year I could only afford to enter 4 Euro Pro tournaments and I made the cut in 3 and only missed the cut on the 4th by a single shot

·      I been coached by some of the world best

o  Stuart Fomes - High Performance Coach and Sports Psychologist

o  Rob Page – TPI Fitness Coach (level 3)

o  Dave March – Swing Coach

o  I’m now being coached by Mike Bannon, Rory McElroys coach


 

All young golf professionals need the helping hand at the start of their careers.


All the famous players we admire that have entertained and amazed us over the years all needed financial support to get them up an running.

 

Now it’s your chance to make a difference and I’m so grateful for your support.


So…please contribute what you can and I look forward to sending you my personal rewards. 

 

Have a good look through all the rewards over on the right hand side of the screen. By the way i would like to make the rewards as personal as i can for each of you so if there is anything you would like added or taken away from the rewards please don't be shy and drop me an email and i will do my best to accommodate you.

 

I’ll be keeping you up to date right through this campaign. Please check out my blog at johnnymallongolf.com.

Also you can join me on facebook, twitter and youtube where I’ll be dishing out some fantastic golfing tips along the way.

 

Again guys thanks so much for taking the time to listen. Please spread the word to your friends and family and I look forward to talking with you again soon.
story_txt:
Hello everyone, I’m Johnny Mallon.
 
If you’re a golf fan, imagine how you'd feel if you had helped British Open Champion Darren Clarke to start his career, or imagine if you’d played an important part in Rory McElroy’s phenomenal success.
 
So, even if you’re not a golf fan, what a claim to fame that would be.
 
Well… here’s your chance to help launch my career and follow in the footsteps of all Irish golf champions.
 
…And better still, you’ll be rewarded for your help.
 


 
 
I’m a professional golfer from Ireland. 
I’m working towards becoming a European and  PGA Tour Player and with your help I’m raising $26,000 to fund the first step of the journey.
 
I’m giving every one of you fantastic 
rewards for your contributions.
 
For example, how would you like to take 3 of your friends and join me at major tournament with VIP access..., rubbing shoulders with the worlds golfing stars, like Tiger Woods or Lee Westwood…
…or, be my caddie for the day at a European or PGA Tour event...
…or own a Tour golf bag from my first Year on Tour… 
…I’m also giving you my personal coaching advice to improve your golf swing, and giving you private and personal monthly updates to build on your progress…
…And, I’m giving every single one of you something very unique and personal.
 
Check out all the rewards on the right-hand side of your screen.

 


 
So why does a professional golfer like me 
need funding to reach the top level?
 
Well… if you’re not already familiar with the process, 
here’s how it works:
 
All Pro golfers need funding to take their first steps towards the big time. This sponsorship money pays for travel, hotel and food, and entry fees to tournaments. Without funding a Pro golfer wouldn’t be able to attend and play in these tournaments.
 
Traditionally most young Pro golfers got their funding from local business, or friends and family.
But, today’s tough economy means local sponsors are almost non-existent.
 
Just think…what will happen to the game if young professional golfers don’t have the chance to break through to the top level…what if we had never had the chance to enjoy Rory McElroy, Darren Clarke, Tiger Woods, or Ernie Els? 
 
So I’m determined to break through and 
achieve my goals so I need your help.
 
After all, it’s the regular everyday golfers that keep the sport alive, and your interest in the sport that turns major players into household names.
 

Here’s how your contributions will be used:
 
From April, the money will be used to enter and attend various tournaments on the Europro Tour and Jamega Tour.
 
Your funding will pay for the entry fees, and 
travel and accommodation for all of these events.
 
My aim is that the winnings from these tournaments will fund my next step to move up the ranks in September this year, which means I would be a member of the Challenge Tour from January 2013. 
A good performance here means I automatically qualify for the “European Tour”….and that’s the top level.
 


So how do you know if I’m any good?

Well, here’s the story so far:
 
·      I started playing at age 10
·      Darren Clarke spotted my potential and paid my sponsorship to The Sports Academy at age 18  (www.thesportsacademy.org)
·      At The Sports Academy I was selected for the UK team to play Spain in a Ryder Cup style 3 day tournament…I was the highest scoring player on the tournament
·      I was the first player ever to be voted Junior and Senior Player of the Year in the same year, at my club, Dungannon Golf Club, where Darren Clarke started his career
·      First time attending Europro tour school at 20 years old, I qualified 3rd out of 116 players
·      That year I could only afford to enter 4 Euro Pro tournaments and I made the cut in 3 and only missed the cut on the 4th by a single shot
·      I been coached by some of the world best
o  Stuart Fomes - High Performance Coach and Sports Psychologist 
o  Rob Page – TPI Fitness Coach (level 3)
o  Dave March – Swing Coach
o  I’m now being coached by Mike Bannon, Rory McElroys coach

 
All young golf professionals need the helping hand at the start of their careers. 

All the famous players we admire that have entertained and amazed us over the years all needed financial support to get them up an running.
 
Now it’s your chance to make a difference and I’m so grateful for your support.

So…please contribute what you can and I look forward to sending you my personal rewards. 
 
Have a good look through all the rewards over on the right hand side of the screen. By the way i would like to make the rewards as personal as i can for each of you so if there is anything you would like added or taken away from the rewards please don't be shy and drop me an email and i will do my best to accommodate you.
 
I’ll be keeping you up to date right through this campaign. Please check out my blog at johnnymallongolf.com.
Also you can join me on facebook, twitter and youtube where I’ll be dishing out some fantastic golfing tips along the way.
 
Again guys thanks so much for taking the time to listen. Please spread the word to your friends and family and I look forward to talking with you again soon.

story:
I thought it was a simple broken foot...

Hi everyone!  My name is Michelle Deputy.  I am a 23 year old Jersey girl, Penn State alum and a Kappa Delta. 

In January 2007, I was dancing to country music in my kitchen with my family, when I rolled my ankle and broke my right foot.  My doctor put me in a foot cast for 8 weeks, and before I knew it, I was ready to graduate high school.

As anyone who has ever been to Penn State knows, there is a lot of walking, and during my first semester I started to notice that my right foot was constantly swollen and occasionally became painful.  I went to my doctor, and he told me that I had a neuroma (a cluster of nerves in between the bones), which was the source of my pain.

When I couldn't take the pain anymore, I decided to have surgery to remove my neuroma in June 2010.  However, the neuroma grew back, so I had it removed again in May 2011.  And again in September 2011.

Even with all of these surgeries, physical therapy and different procedures, my pain continued to get worse.  The pain was more constant and severe and made it impossible for me to stand or walk for long periods of time.  Also, it started to hurt to physically touch my foot.  Even something as simple as putting my sock on became a torturous task.  

 

Things got serious...

In September 2011, my doctor told me that there was something more serious going on.  After more tests and a lot more visits to a bunch of new doctors, I was diagnosed with Reflex Sympathetic Dystrophy (RSD) or Chronic Regional Pain Syndrome (CRPS).

RSD is a neurological disorder with no known cure, which, lucky for me, means that I may have to live with this for the rest of my life.  Also, since it is nerve related, there is an extremely high rate of the pain transferring to my other foot or to both of my hands.  A doctor who specializes in RSD told me that there are already signs of the RSD spreading to my left foot and both of my hands.

Since I could no longer stand without crying, I had to quit my job and move back home with my parents.

I started physical therapy again, but after three months and no improvement, we decided to stop.  I then had a Sympathetic Nerve Block in December 2011, but that didn't help either.  In February 2012, I had a trial Spinal Cord Stimulator put into my back for five days to see if the stimulation could override the pain signals, but instead it just made the pain worse.

Running out of options, my mom and dad took me for experimental Calmare Therapy.  Since the technology is relatively new, the insurance company would not pay for it, and we had to pay $1,000 out of pocket.  We also had to drive an hour and ten minutes to and from Staten Island everyday for 10 days in a row.  Again, I had no relief from my pain.

 

My life with RSD...

The hardest part about having RSD is that most people don't know about it.  People see me in a foot cast and usually assume that I broke my foot.  

Since I look healthy, people don't realize that I am in constant, unbearable, excruciating pain.  They don't understand that the idea of driving a car or going to the mall or doing anything that a normal 23 year old should do brings me to tears, because I know that within 15 minutes I will be in so much pain that I will have trouble breathing.  

They don't understand why I can't work or why I never want to leave the house.  They don't believe that when my bed sheet hits my foot at night that I need to scream out in pain.  They don't realize how much my family, boyfriend and friends sacrifice everyday to make sure that I am comfortable.

For years, RSD has made every second of every day of my life hard to live.  

However, it has also made me realize who I can really count on, who my true friends are, and how important my faith in God is.  And I am thankful for that every day.  

 

Ketamine Infusion...

On September 10th to September 21st of 2012, I will be going for a 10 day Ketamine Infusion in Philadelphia (besides the weekends).  This infusion will, in layman's terms, help to reset my nervous system and make my brain stop or slow the pain signal that it sends to my foot.

The infusion is 4 hours a day, so everyday my parents, boyfriend, sisters (and brother-in-laws) and friends will drive me to Philadelphia so that I can get my infusion.  Unfortunately, no one is allowed in the room with me while I have to get this done, which means that it will be pretty scary having to do this alone.  

The biggest problem with the infusion is that my insurance company doesn't cover the costs because it is considered to be experimental.

The total 10 day cost is $5,000.  After the 10 days, I will need to go back for four 2-day booster sessions.  Each 2 day booster session is an additional $1,000, bringing my total cost to $9,000.  

If the ketamine infusion is successful, I will continue to need two or three 2-day booster infusion sessions.  Each 2-day booster session is $1,000 and I will need these booster sessions for many years to come.

Since I cannot work, it makes it basically impossible for me to pay this by myself.  My parents, however, are amazing and have taken on the cost of this infusion.  It is huge, unplanned expense.

 

How you can help...

Thank you so much for reading about my journey for RSD.  As I have said, I need $9,000 to get my ketamine infusion (and I will continue to need many booster sessions for many years that are $1,000 per 2-day session).  This infusion will help give me my life back!

Any donations will go directly to help pay for my infusion.  Please feel free to spread the word, not only about my infusion, but about RSD.  The more people that know about it, the more people that can be helped.

 

Thank you again!  I love you all!

Michelle

story:
My name is Ja'Mel Ashlin. I am a 24yr old UW - Madison alumnus from Detroit, MI. I grew up in a single parent home where my mother always taught me the value of loving who I am. My mother named me both woman and man, Ashely Ja'Mel, because she knew I had two spirits. As a teenager I questioned my gender as my body became more feminine. My mother told me on her death bed "All Boys Grow Differently". It's time for this boy to become a man.

Your contribution to my camapign would assist with cost of surgery, travel, and room and board. The surgeon I would like to see is known for his work in the FTM (female to male) community - Dr. Charles Garramone in Davey, FL. 

With both of my parents deceased and a mound of student loan debt I am unable to afford this procedure on my own.

I need $10,000 to cover the cost of surgery. 

  • $6,500 for FTM top surgery double incision method
  • $2,000 for Mansculpture procedure body masculation 
  • $1,500 for travel + 1 (my caretaker), room and board, and to buy the artist contributing to perks a thank-you

Bringing me to the PERKS! Your contribution is greatly appreciate therefore I'd like to reward your giving. My first giveaway will be an unlimited amount of personalized YOUTUBE shoutouts! The second giveaway will also be an unlimited amount - an autographed copy of my narrative "All Boys Grow Differently"! Now here is where things become SUPER exciting! I am a published writer so my third giveaway will be 20 autographed copies of Our Lives magazine featuring ME! But really none of those giveaways are as special as the last - my good friend Nick Villegas is going to create 7 custome drawings for our biggest donators! 

Now, $10,000 is a lot of money! It is the exact amount I need to have a surgeon well versed in FTM top surgery. If i do not meet this goal I will have to fundraise harder OR find another surgeon to complete the operation. Every dollar counts and every dollar will be used towards the completion of my top surgery. 

The number of visible transgender people are growing as we live in a more tolarable world. However, many trans youth never get to see the day of their transition because of finacial issues. A lot of gender queer youth don't have the opportunity to think about transition because they commit suicide. I have been extermely lucky to come from a mother who taught me that it is ok to be who I am. I am also, grateful for the support system I continue to have throughout my life. 

Your donation is helping me get one step closer to living my life to its fullest potiental. And with your help I will be able to continue to give help to LGBTQ+ youth!

Please feel free to pass this campiagn on to your friends and families and LGBTQ+ organizations in your area!

Thank you for your time and donation

Ja'Mel Ashlin W.

story:
About Mike Ross

 

Mike Ross is 55 yeras old and lives in palestine Texas he has been in our lives since I was about 3 years old. He is not mine or my younger brothers biological father but none the less has been our dad over the years. He is a great man always trying to make the best out of any situation even the one he is in now. Only a few weeks ago he was diagnosed with stage four lung cancer. The doctors only give him 6 months to a year left. The news has taken a huge tole on us all.

My parents do not know that I am asking this from the public but I fear I have no choice. Due to the Chemo he will be receiving and the meds he must have there is no way we can do this alone. Losing my fahter is something we never wanted to think about now its all we can think about. My mother is under a huge amount of stress and I do not want that. which is why I ask from the bottom of my heart please help me soften this heavy burden they are under right now by doing anything we can to help them.

 

 Thank you.

story:
November 24, 2012 I officially became married to and a part of my husband's family in India. They have showed me more kindness, more total acceptance and wild generosity as they welcomed me into their family than I have ever experienced in my whole life. Living with them has taught me incredible things.

I want to give back. My husband's mother has had kidney failure and has been on dialysis for over a year. There is no subsidized medical care in India and the responsibility of medical bills falls solely on the family members. Three times a week they take her to the nearest dialysis center, an hour's drive by car, to get treatment. Up until now they have been using their family savings, but they are very near the end of their savings. Her condition is serious and life threatening without treatment.

So we are raising money. The cost of medicine, injections, dialysis and transportation to the dialysis center costs only around $80 per visit, 3 times per week costs around $1000 per month! I figured that if a few people could give just $15 - $20 per month (the cost of 4-5 lattes), we would have enough to cover her treatments. Give as little or as much as you like, every little bit counts and helps. We are so grateful.
