story:
Introducing FUJI Mask

Since face coverings have become a public necessity, we’ve heard stories from friends and family about the endless search for a perfect everyday mask. The common complaint was that most masks are ill-fitting and uncomfortable, especially for their children. 

After sharing ideas and feedback with parents in our community, we designed a solution, the Fuji Mask.

With Japanese precision standards and attention to detail, the Fuji Mask was designed to be gentle for all skin types, easy to breathe through, and fit properly for all day comfort. By washing and reusing the Fuji mask, we can protect our environment and our loved ones.

 

 

 

 

 

The Best Comfortable Mask from Japan

   

 

 

Size Guide and Colors

Warning:

RISK OF SUFFOCATION. Not intended for children under age 2, anyone who has trouble breathing, or otherwise unable to remove the mask without assistance.

 

Pink, Olive , Navy Blue. Four sizes available.

 

 

 

About The FUJI Mask

After numerous iterations with our pattern makers, sewing engineers, and production staff, we developed a range of masks for both adults and children.

Fuji masks are made of two layers of 100% organic fine jersey with an antimicrobial finish for protection, enhanced breathability, and comfort for the entire family.

Available in four sizes, each mask was designed with attention to chin contour, strap length, and fit around the ears. Our masks are individually hand sewn, utilizing the natural elasticity and weave of the fabric for optimal fit, without gaps, to allow full coverage.

Note: This mask has not been evaluated by the CDC or FDA and is not a substitute for N95, surgical, or procedural masks.

TioTio Premium Processing is registered and certified with SKE (Registration number K079A, JAPAN) 

 

 

 

Antibacterial  - TioTio Premium Processing

 

Your Masks clean enough? 

Tio tio processing suppresses the growth of germs so that the mask stays clean at all times for infants and individuals with sensitive skin. The special fabric also helps with eliminating unpleasant odor. 

After a 50 cycle wash test, results show that it still resists germs! 

 

       

 

 

 

 

 

 

Fuji Masks are produced in a full service factory developing and manufacturing quality products for premiere US and Japanese fashion brands that are coveted worldwide. Our reputation has been built by our attention to detail, Japanese craftsmanship, and ability to constantly develop and create innovative products.
story_txt:
Introducing FUJI Mask
Since face coverings have become a public necessity, we’ve heard stories from friends and family about the endless search for a perfect everyday mask. The common complaint was that most masks are ill-fitting and uncomfortable, especially for their children. 
After sharing ideas and feedback with parents in our community, we designed a solution, the Fuji Mask.
With Japanese precision standards and attention to detail, the Fuji Mask was designed to be gentle for all skin types, easy to breathe through, and fit properly for all day comfort. By washing and reusing the Fuji mask, we can protect our environment and our loved ones.
 






 

 
 
 
The Best Comfortable Mask from Japan
   
 
 
Size Guide and Colors

Warning:
RISK OF SUFFOCATION. Not intended for children under age 2, anyone who has trouble breathing, or otherwise unable to remove the mask without assistance.
 

Pink, Olive , Navy Blue. Four sizes available.


 
 
 
About The FUJI Mask
After numerous iterations with our pattern makers, sewing engineers, and production staff, we developed a range of masks for both adults and children.
Fuji masks are made of two layers of 100% organic fine jersey with an antimicrobial finish for protection, enhanced breathability, and comfort for the entire family.
Available in four sizes, each mask was designed with attention to chin contour, strap length, and fit around the ears. Our masks are individually hand sewn, utilizing the natural elasticity and weave of the fabric for optimal fit, without gaps, to allow full coverage.
Note: This mask has not been evaluated by the CDC or FDA and is not a substitute for N95, surgical, or procedural masks.
TioTio Premium Processing is registered and certified with SKE (Registration number K079A, JAPAN) 


 
 
 
Antibacterial  - TioTio Premium Processing 
 
Your Masks clean enough? 
Tio tio processing suppresses the growth of germs so that the mask stays clean at all times for infants and individuals with sensitive skin. The special fabric also helps with eliminating unpleasant odor. 
After a 50 cycle wash test, results show that it still resists germs! 
 


       
 

 
 
 
 

 
Fuji Masks are produced in a full service factory developing and manufacturing quality products for premiere US and Japanese fashion brands that are coveted worldwide. Our reputation has been built by our attention to detail, Japanese craftsmanship, and ability to constantly develop and create innovative products.

story:
Dogs are one of the world’s greatest biosensors, capable of detecting odours associated with drugs, explosives and food and are now being used in practice for public health.

We believe we could use dogs as a diagnostic tool to screen high numbers of people to detect people who are infected with COVID-19. If we can do this, it could help us to get back to normal life, quicker.  The project has begun but to complete it, we need your help!

This work could be profoundly impactful in the fight against COVID-19.

 

Who are we?

The study is led by Professor James Logan who is the Head of the Department of Disease Control at the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, along side Dr Claire Guest, CEO of Medical Detection Dogs and Professor Steve Lindsay, from Durham University, and their respective, highly experience teams. We are also working with local NHS hospitals in London.

We have already trained dogs successfully to detect the presence of malaria in human odour with a high degree of accuracy (see the TEDx talk video below!). Importantly, the dogs can detect odours from infected people who have no symptoms.  As well as malaria, we have trained dogs to diagnose cancer and Parkinson’s disease and many other medical conditions that change human body odour. If COVID-19 has a smell - we are confident the dogs will detect it.

 

Does COVID-19 Smell?

Many diseases change our body odour. This has been shown many times in scientifically robust experiments. Recent research on flu viruses, and other respiratory diseases, has shown that these diseases also interact with the human immune system and change human body odour. There is a very good chance that COVID-19 has a distinctive body odour. 

Based on our previous work, we believe that dogs will be able to detect it with great accuracy.

 

How Will We Do It?

Proof-of-principle: First we need to collect odour samples from people who are infected with COVID-19, and people who are uninfected. Then, we will use those odour samples with 6 dogs that are already pre-trained and awaiting training with the COVID-19 samples. Through an intensive training programme, we will test the method rigorously and, if successful, we could deploy dogs within as little as 8-10 weeks after training.

Scale-up: If successful we will scale-up our operations rapidly to deploy the trained dogs during the ongoing COVID-19 epidemic. Once trained, our medical detection dogs could be deployed in airports or other venues to screen large numbers of people, providing a rapid non-invasive screening for COVID-19. One single dog can screen up to 250 people per hour!

Once we have shown this works, we will scale up operations on a global scale, by working with dog training agencies, the military and police forces, to deploy dogs in as many countries as possible. We are already in discussion with local governments and border agencies in several countries.

 

Are there any risks associated with this study?

Any scientific study carries an element of risk, but from our own research, and work in other laboratories, we know that most diseases have a distinctive odour, and we think COVID-19 does too. If it does, we are confident the dogs will be able to detect it.

story:
We only sell SWIMBOT PACK through our website now. Go onto swimbot.net to buy your SWIMBOT PACK!

**********

Swimbot: Swim Faster!

 
INTRODUCING SWIMBOT.

The first device that will instantaneously correct your swimming technique

SWIMBOT corrects your stroke instantaneously with sophisticated sounds. The 3D videos teach you perfect swimming technique. 

 

 

SWIMBOT has been tested and is backed by Olympic Champions, World Masters Champions and professional triathletes:

  • Alain Bernard (FR) 100 freestyle Olympic Champion in 2008
  • Jim Montgomery (USA) 100 freestyle Olympic Champion in 1976
  • Rowdy Gaines (USA) 100 freestyle Olympic Champion in 1984
  • Nicolas Granger (FR) 24x World Master Champion
  • Jeanne Collonge (FR) 2x winner of Embrunman (world's toughest triathlon)
  • Romain Guillaume (FR) Top 10 Hawaii Triathlon 
 

SWIMBOT in the media

                             
                                    

 
                           

 

 

“Swimbot can do miracles " S.Soumier - BFMTV

"Technology serving performance thanks to SWIMBOT" H.Sannier - France 3

"Without replacing the coach, SWIMBOT is a breaktrough for swimming training" Alexandre Boyon - France 3

 

 

DÉCOUVREZ NOS OFFRES INDIEGOGO EN FRANÇAIS ICI

 

HOW DOES IT WORK? 

3 STEPS TO PROGRESS: 

 

1) Before your workout

● Visualize our 3D videos

● Assimilate and retain the ideal stroke patterns

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

2) During your workout

● Slip your SWIMBOT under your swim cap. Using bone conduction technology, our earphones offer you comfort and high-quality sound.

● It analyzes each and every move you make.

● It provides you with instant feedback via sophisticated sounds.

 

 

 

 

3) After your workout*

  • Synchronize SWIMBOT with your Smartphone via Bluetooth, and share your progress with your friends!

  • Share your performance and compare yourself to thousands of swimming enthusiasts.

*available in a future update

LET'S SWIM WITH SWIMBOT!

 

SWIMBOT FEATURES

SWIMBOT includes different levels and kind of exercises whether you are a beginner, intermediary or expert.

 

TECH SPECS

 
Waterproof device
 

ABOUT SWIMBOT BONE CONDUCTION EARPHONES

 

Bone conduction is the safest and most efficient audio solution for swimmers. It transmits our sophisticated sounds through bone vibrations next to your your ears. In the water, the sound is great and it does not stop you from hearing your coach's instructions.

Swimbot playing music*

*available in a future update of your SWIMBOT

 

 
 

SERVICE PLANS

Synchronization of SWIMBOT  is accessible with any Smartphone/Laptop/Computer/Tablet  Apple, Androïd, etc.
 
 

SWIMBOT 3D VIDEOS

WATCH A PREVIEW OF OUR GREAT SWIMMING 3D VIDEOS:

« Talent isn't born, it’s grown »  

 

 

Improve faster and experience Swimbot's unique "Deep Practice" method.

Enjoy online access to our ever improving pack of SWIMBOT 3D videos (*).

 

 

« SWIMBOT Basics » 

 

 

 

Discover and learn all the secrets to improve your freestyle technique: 

  • Propulsion: become a master of propulsion like Alain Bernard!

  • Streamlining: swim smart and waste less energy

  • Breathing: break the secret of breathing to improve efficiency

 

« SWIMBOT Exercises » 

 

They are all featured in our original 3D vidéos on the right and wrong technique, and help you to get familiarised with our sophisticated sounds before you use the SwimBot in the water.

They will guide you instantaneously when swimming!

 

Theme « Head and Breathing »

 

 

  • Breathing head roll: focus on the angle of rotation of your head every time you breathe.

  • Breathing timing: Learn the ideal breathing timing while you swim.

  • Steady head: Keep your head steady to optimize your streamlining.

 

Theme « Streamlining »

 

 

  • Lateral Streamlining: Learn how to reduce unnecessary lateral movements by improving body position and stroke patterns.

  • Vertical Streamlining: Learn how to reduce unnecessary vertical movements by improving body position and stroke patterns.

 

Theme « Propulsion »

 

 

  • Stroke range: Improve your distance per stroke. SWIMBOT counts your strokes and calculates your distance per stroke.

  • Continuous motion: Reduce the changes in forward velocity which occur during your stroke cycle thanks to the instant audio feedback. Balance the power of both stroking arms in freestyle and backstroke.

  • Smart tempo: Enter the tempo you wish to work at. SWIMBOT gives you signals every time you lose your rhythm.

  • Steady tempo: Enter the tempo you wish to work at. SWIMBOT gives you a constant beep for you to follow.

  • Building tempo: Enter the initial tempo and the final tempo as well as the duration of the exercise. SWIMBOT gives you a tempo sound which gradually increases.

(*) Our SWIMBOT videos will be improved monthly with updates,  thanks to the feedbacks of our community of « early adopters & champions ».

 

 

 

SWIMBOT PARTNERS

                                   

 

 

                          

 

        “An innovative start-up which is about to revolutionize Swimming” 

                                                               ChronoMaîtres

FAQ

 

FAQ EN FRANÇAIS ICI

 

Each contribution is very helpful for us. So far we have produced a few SWIMBOT and they work perfectly. Your contribution will allow us to mass produce. You will help more than 1 million people to learn how to swim!

 

 

 

Can I use SWIMBOT if I’m not a pro?

Sure, SWIMBOT corrects the technique of any swimmer, even beginners. There will be different levels. It is possible to switch levels anytime.

What is the difference between SWIMBOT and an existing activity trackers for swimming?

SWIMBOT is much more than an activity tracker: it provides instantaneous feedback while swimming. Before your workout you select the technical point you want to focus on and then Swimbot corrects you instantaneously during your workout.

Where will be the sensors? On my skin?

All sensors are inside SWIMBOT. You don't need to put any extra sensors on your arm/chest/skin, etc.

Is it possible to put SWIMBOT somewhere else than the back of my head?

No. Every move you make in the water is linked to your head.

Won't it damage my head?

Of course not! Every connection is deactivated in the water. Only the sensors are on while swimming.

Will SWIMBOT always make the same sound in order to correct me?

There is one specific sound for each exercise you want to work on. For example, if you select the exercise "steady head" to keep your head steady while swimming there will a specific sound for this exercise. The sounds are different for each exercise.

Does SWIMBOT recognize every stroke?

SWIMBOT already recognizes : freestyle and underwater kicks. SWIMBOT also detects the time you spend during the  underwater phases before you break out (see video).

Do the noises make me crazy?

SWIMBOT only beeps when your technique is incorrect for the exercise you selected. When the technique is correct there are no sounds.

The sophisticated sounds are pleasant to hear. The bone conduction headphones don't go into your ear, but you fix them to your swimcap and against your temple. In this way you don't have anything going into your ear when you swim.

When will I get my SWIMBOT ?

You will get full online access to our SWIMBOT 3D tutorials at the end of our campaign (March 2016) and get the SWIMBOT device in September 2016.

What are the shipping costs?

 

Shipping costs are:

- 8$ for  "SWIMBOT SNAILERS", 

 

Is it possible to test SWIMBOT?

Test sessions have already started in France. You can visit our Facebook page and our YouTube channel to see feedbacks. We are actually dealing with partners to organize test sessions in US and UK.

 

 

OUR STORY

 

SWIMBOT was created in France second half of 2013 by David Jamet, former competitor swimmer with a heavy tech background. Our team is now composed of 8 passionate persons.

Two and a half years of research and development, patents, significant investment and hard work have made our breakthrough in digital swimming possible.

Today, we are proud to deliver a fantastic, awesome and innovating device. It is a leap forward in learning and the hardware is reliable and has been tested and approved by great champions.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

MEET SWIMBOT TEAM

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
Hello – my name is Philip and I have been connected with healthcare for most of my working life.


I’m trying to help improve care for dementia patients in the UK, and I need your help to do it.

Dementia is a cruel and indiscriminating disease, effecting over eight hundred thousand people in the UK. It is mostly known as a disease that takes away memories, but it also has serious effects on a person’s health in general.

There may well be an eventual cure for dementia, but that is some way off. Until then, all we have is medication and the dedication of carers trying to do their best.



Is there anything that can be done today to help?

Yes there is...

JustoCat is an interactive, therapeutic cat, a CE Class 1 Medical Device, developed to provide calming support for people with dementia.

It was invented by two Swedish University professors specialising in clinical care and robotics. JustoCat has been proven in clinical trials, and provides benefits to patients, professional carers and relatives alike.

I would like you to watch the short film for a few minutes and hopefully you will see how JustoCat can help support patients, carers and families alike.




So what can you do to help?

I would like your to help by making a donation for JustoCat’s adoption into care homes and to start making real a difference for dementia patients, their families and of course the working lives of carers.

We want to reach a target of getting 99 JustoCats adopted into 99 care homes.

To achieve this target, we need your help to donate anything you can afford.

It will help. Thank you.

Even if you can't afford to donate at this time, you can still help by spreading the word to all those that you know, that might want to. 

The Indiegogo share tools will make this easy for you.


So who will receive a JustoCat?

I have a number of care homes waiting to receive JustoCat but you can nominate a care home, if you would like to, and I will do my best to get a JustoCat to them. 

Quite simply, click on the "Contact" link and then type in the message box - your name, the name and the full postal address of the care home.

I will be publishing an evolving list of care homes who are about to receive a JustoCat, on this page.


JustoCat makes a difference

Together we can make a real difference to 99 care homes, more if possible, their patients, the relatives and the carers.

"I am proud to have technology to support my work in caring for people with late stage dementia. JustoCat is an instrument for interaction and communication, and it gives something common to talk about and to interactive with. To use JustoCat while caring for the patient gives us both a moment of rest, well being, and the time to relax together."
Professional care giver testimonial


“My mother loves her JustoCat, not even when it is time for lunch or dinner does she want to drop the cat. She pets it all the time. She is in her wheelchair with a table in front of her. The cat is laying on the table.”
Relative's testimonial

Together we can make a real difference to 99 care homes, more if possible, their patients, the relatives and the carers.
"I
 am proud to have technology to support my work in caring for people 
with late stage dementia. JustoCat is an instrument for interaction and 
communication, and it gives something common to talk about and to 
interactive with. To use JustoCat while caring for the patient gives us 
both a moment of rest, well being, and the time to relax together."Professional care giver testimonial 

“My mother loves her JustoCat, not even when it is time
 for lunch or dinner does she want to drop the cat. She pets it all the 
time. She is in her wheelchair with a table in front of her. The cat is 
laying on the table.”Relative's testimonial

story:
My Story

I discovered functional medicine while I was still a medical student and I have been obsessed with it since. While mainstream western medicine can be life saving in emergency situations, I was looking for a wholistic approach that helps people to to optimise their health and performance, by addressing the root cause of their issues. Functional  Medicine (AKA nutritional/biomedical medicine) is an evidence based, individualised approach that aims to recognise and address the root cause of disease, using diagnostic tests, individualised dietary and lifestyle  modifications  and other natural and low risk interventions based on nutritional science, genomics and epigenetics. I have discovered the power of nutrition when experiencing some health issues myself. While medication helped alliviating my symptoms, a simple change in my diet solved the problem completely. Since then I have been studying functional medicine in every free minute I have and have become extremely passionate about helping other people heal in the same way. I have completed the foundation course in nutritional and environmental medicine at the Australian College of Nutritional and Environmental Medicine and this year I am also undertaking functional medicine training at the Kresser Institute. This is an amazing program, that will allow me to provide the most cutting edge care to my patients. However, it is very expensive and I need your help in order to be able to complete it.

I intend to open the first Functional Medicine clinic in the upper Blue Mountains NSW, in February 2018. 

The money raised in this campaign will go towards paying the fees of my functional medicine training. Help me make a difference!

  • In return to your contribution your will receive free or discounted consultations  when the clinic opens in February 2018. The costs of these consults will be much higher when the clinic actually opens, so this is a very good value investment!
  • I am 100% comitted to opening the clinic, even if I don't reach my crowdfunding goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please get the word out!
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools

story:
“Most of us know the importance of hydration.  Yet, research shows that 40% of Americans are not drinking enough water each day. How can this be?  While exercise and diet dominate the health discussion and our consumer spending, perhaps the most important health driver - hydration - is something we ‘wing’ each day.   

KOR+ is a simple and easy, but also revolutionary, approach to daily hydration.  With each sip, the KOR+ adds molecular hydrogen (H2) and electrolytes to water, while also pH balancing and purifying in real-time.  

Drinking KOR+ daily helps activate your own antioxidant defenses, essentially turning your body on so you can fight free radicals, improve exercise and recovery, achieve weight loss, and defend against life’s daily stressors.”
 


 

The first water bottle system to purify, pH balance, and hydrogen-enhance water as you sip.


 


 

Antioxidants to boost your body’s defenses and alkaline to fight acidity.
 


Just like an apple exposed to air, our bodies are constantly under siege from the effects of oxidative stress.

KOR+ activates your antioxidant enzymes to fight free radicals and counteract oxidation.

 

KOR+ raises pH up to 9.5, helping to balance your body from acidic foods and stressors.
 





The KOR+ filter is made from coconut shells infused with rare earth minerals.  It not only removes impurities, but adds important electrolytes that help you stay hydrated.



 



A daily dose of antioxidant support through the power of molecular hydrogen (H2).  Research supports a wide range of health benefits from the role hydrogen plays in helping your body fight free radicals.



 

 


 


 


 

Scientists agree that oxidative stress causes most human health issues. They also agree that antioxidants help fight oxidative stress.  It’s no surprise, then, that in more than 600 scientific studies, including at least 40+ human trials, molecular hydrogen has been shown to be therapeutic in nearly every human organ and in over 150 human disease cases.
 
“Hydrogen is a novel antioxidant with great potential for actual medical applications.  Preliminary clinical trials show that drinking hydrogen-dissolved water seems to improve the pathology of mitochondrial disorders. Hydrogen has biological benefits toward preventive and therapeutic applications”

“Acute oxidative stress causes serious damage to tissues, and persistent oxidative stress is one of the causes of many common diseases, cancer and the aging process….We have reported that molecular hydrogen has potential as an effective antioxidant for medical applications”

Title: Molecular hydrogen is a novel antioxidant to efficiently reduce oxidative stress with potential for the improvement of mitochondrial diseases
By: Ohta, S. 
Biochimica et Biophysica Acta


“Hydrogen-rich water might be an appropriate and safe hydration strategy that helps athletes to become less susceptible to exercise-induced acidosis.”
Title: Is molecular hydrogen beneﬁcial to enhance post-exercise recovery infemale athletes?
By:Drid P, et al. 
Sci sports (2016)

A 2010 study from the Journal of Clinical Biochemistry and Nutrition showed that when 20 overweight or obese subjects with symptoms of metabolic syndrome (high blood pressure, insulin resistance) drank 1.5 to 2 liters a day of hydrogen water for eight weeks with no other dietary changes, they saw a 39 percent increase in an enzyme that fortifies the body against free radicals; a 43 percent drop in thiobarbituric acid, a substance linked to oxidative damage; and a 13 percent decrease in total cholesterol—results comparable to those of cholesterol-controlling meds.
“What Is Hydrogen Water and Should You Drink It?”, Elle Magazine, April 2017

“Our recent work shows that hydrogen has unique effect on improving mitochondrial function to prevent and treat mitochondrial dysfunction-related diseases, such as metabolic syndrome and cardiovascular disease. These exciting findings provide us strong belief that Hydrogen Medicine will have a brilliant future and play more and more important role in human health.”
-DR. JIANKANG LIU MD
University of Southern California School of Pharmacy 

"...I witnessed with my own eyes in my own lab the remarkable benefits of hydrogen... I believe it is my mission to use my expertise in molecular biology...to help other people realize the medical benefits of hydrogen.”
- DR. Kinji Ohno  MD., PhD
Nagoya University Graduate School of Medicine

“I learned about H2 as a potential radical scavenger that could more easily permeate the injured organs; although skeptical, our lab began investigations and were amazed at the protective effects. “
-Dr. Jan Slezak M.D., Ph.D 
Slovak Medical University in Bratislava

 



Using a patent-pending process, ordinary water is pulled through the "+capsule" where it is instantly filtered, pH balanced, and infused with molecular hydrogen and electrolytes. It's super water on demand.

 

 

 


 


 
 

Unparalleled hydration to support your body’s health at a fraction of the cost of bottled water or countertop devices.

 



Built from durable, BPA-free and health-safe materials, the KOR+ system means no more disposable bottles and less landfill waste.​

 




 


 


 


 

 



All the health benefits you want bottled into the vessel that supports your health daily.


 


 

The KOR+ app tells you exactly how much KOR+ water to drink daily and enables you to measure the results. The app also helps you build and maintain a daily hydration habit through coaching, guidance and personal challenges.



 


 

We’ve made it our mission to find an easy, affordable way to deliver your daily dose of health and wellness wherever you are.  

KOR+ is the result of our 10 years of hydration insights.

Since 2008, we’ve developed innovative personal hydration solutions that improve health while taking care of the planet.  From our initial KOR ONE Hydration Vessel, we’ve since launched dozens of products, including the successfully crowdfunded KOR Nava filtered bottle and the KOR Water Fall pour-over water filter.


 


 




We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.



We plan to ship the product starting in December 2017. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. 



By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first KOR+ systems ever created, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of KOR products.
 


 

 

What is it? KOR+ creates hydrogen-rich, alkaline water.
Who created it? Eric Barnes.
Why should we use it? KOR+ goes where you go. Use it like you would use any water bottle. It's the perfect accessory for your day. 
How much does it cost?  Regularly, $120.00, $15.00/month for 1yr Subscription, bottle is included.
Where can we buy it? Indiegogo.
What do we get when we order? When you order, you'll receive the KOR+ bottle and your choice of filter package option.


What is the bottle made from? The KOR+ is made from BPA-Free Eastman Triton polyester an FDA-approved, health-safe material that's durable and beautifully clear.
What colors do you offer? The KOR+ comes in a crisp clear bottle and a frosted white lid.
What sizes do you offer? 615mL
Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet? The KOR+ is being made with you in mind. The bottle fits nicely in your hand and the straw, the KOR Spout, is designed for comfort. 
Bottle features? The KOR Hygienic Spout keeps your straw protected from the outside world.

 

What are the dimensions and weight? Bottle: H 9.47" x W 2.85" x L 1.75" / weight: 7oz Filter: H 2.5" x W 0.5" x L 0.5"/ Weight: 0.5oz
How does it work?  Using a patent-pending centrifuge process, the KOR+ bottle and +capsule transforms ordinary tap water into super water.
What is the uniqueness of the filter technology? The +capsule not only filters water, it also adds molecular hydrogen as you sip. Molecular hydrogen (H2) has been shown to have powerful antioxidant properties. The +capsule also increases the pH up by 2 points.
Where is it manufactured? The bottle is manufactured responsibly in China and the filter is manufactured in South Korea.

 

What does it do? The KOR+ App will calculate your KOR+ goal, coach you through a 30 day challenge, and track your daily KOR+ consumption. 
What is a KOR+ goal? Your KOR+ goal is the recommended amount of water you should be drinking based on your personal inputs to maximize potential health benefits. 
What is the 30 Day Challenge?  The app can coach you through a 30 day challenge to help you develop a healthy hydration habit. Additionally, it will measure your health progress throughout and display it on a personal dashboard for easy access. 
What if I don't want to join the 30 Day Challenge? No problem! You can use the app to track just your daily KOR+ intake and send you hydration reminders. 
How will the app make sure I stay hydrated? The app has a dynamic bottle that you can adjust to reflect your KOR+ intake for the day, give you updates on how close you are to your goal, and provide an option for reminders. 



How do I set it up? 1. Detach straw from bottle. Remove filter from packet. Rinse filter in water for 30 seconds. 2. Insert filter into lid base with rubber plug facing DOWN (do NOT remove the plug). 3. Reattach straw to lid.4. Reattach lid to bottle.5. Press button of lid to open and enjoy (tilting of bottle not necessary — simply sip like a straw).
How do I clean and care for my KOR+ bottle? Detach the straw and remove the filter. Put the filter in to the KOR+ Capsule storage unit while you wash your bottle.The KOR+ is a hand-wash only bottle. Use a soft bristle brush to clean the sides with warm, soapy water. If needed, use a small bristled brush to clean out the straw's mouthpiece.
Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable? KOR+ and the KOR+ lid are both machine washable. Remove your KOR+ capsule before washing your bottle!
How do I clean my KOR+? Daily washing of your bottle is necessary, since our mouths naturally harbor bacteria, it is highly recommended that you do wash your vessel daily.
How do I store my filter while cleaning my bottle?​ KOR+ ships with a KOR+ Capsule storage vessel for safe keeping while you wash your bottle.
When do I change the filter​? Change your filter 1x/Month. Change on the 1st of every month
Is KOR+ safe to use outside the U.S.? KOR+ was designed for use with potable water only. It will not remove harmful microbes, such as Giardia, which may be present in the tap water of some countries. We recommend only using KOR+ with potable tap water in the following areas: US, Europe, Japan, Canada, Australia and New Zealand. Nevertheless we encourage you to ensure your water meets the equivalent or better of potable water in the U.S. for which the KOR+ was tested.
Can I take my KOR+ to high altitudes, such as on an airplane or to the mountains? What happens if I leave my KOR+ in my car in warmer climates? We encourage you to bring KOR+ wherever you go! Just note that altitude or heat can cause pressure to build up in KOR+, which will cause water to spurt from the mouthpiece when the cap is opened. To prevent this, twist the lid open about a quarter turn to release the pressure. Then tighten the lid back on, sip and enjoy! (This reaction is quite common in closed containers such as lotion bottles, snack bags and other straw-based reusable water bottles).
Can I pour filtered water from the KOR+ into a glass or a bowl for my dog if I tip it upside down?​ No, because KOR+ is designed not to leak when held upside down.
Can I drink juice, Gatorade or other flavored beverages from the KOR+?​ If you want to drink flavored beverages, just remove the filter and the KOR+ will work fine. Otherwise, you might ruin the filter and/or cause your beverage to taste bad.
Will the KOR+ function without the filter in place?​ Yes, it will work fine. However, due to the large volume of the empty filter chamber, it will take somewhat longer to get water into your mouth on the first sip. After that, the KOR+ air-tight seal will keep the chamber filled and you won't notice anything unusual on subsequent sips (unless you open the bottle which breaks the seal).
What happens if my filter freezes? We don’t recommend freezing a moist filter because the water will expand when frozen, which may lead to breakage. Therefore you should inspect the filter. If it isn’t cracked or broken, it will still function.



What are the recommend ages? All ages
Where can I use it? Everywhere you go!
Is it safe? KOR+'s activated carbon filter is made from coconut shells, which are widely recognized as the most effective material for carbon filtration. After harvesting, the shells are converted to activated carbon using a proprietary process that minimizes greenhouse gas emissions. Unlike coal, which takes millions of years to form and may contain heavy metals, coconut is a renewable and health-safe resource. The rare earth mineral blend is a proprietary blend of minerals that occur naturally and are safe for ingestion.
Is the bottle BPA Free?​ YES! As a company, we place the utmost priority on the health safety of our products. While there is still debate over the health impact of BPA, we didn't want to leave anything to chance. That's why none of our products contain BPA.
What is activated carbon? Activated carbon has been used for thousands of years to purify water. Here's why: In its natural state, carbon has a strong affinity for absorbing organic compounds such as chlorine and benzine. Activated carbon is simply a form of carbon that has been processed under high heat to become extremely porous (in fact, a teaspoon of activated carbon has the roughly the surface area of a football field). Combined with carbon's natural absorptive properties, all that surface area enables a tremendous amount of absorption when water passes through the filter.
Is the KOR+ filter compostable/biodegradable?​ No. This is because the coconut carbon in the filter is held together with a small amount of polyethylene binder. Otherwise it would disintegrate quickly. We are investigating ways of making the binder from a biodegradable material and hope to make a compostable version of the filter someday soon.
What do you mean about your filter being "sustainably manufactured"?​ Activated carbon is manufactured by heating organic materials to very high temperatures. This typically results in a large release of greenhouse gasses. Our supplier uses a proprietary process that reduces emissions by trapping greenhouse gasses and reusing them to produce thermal energy.
Is my KOR vessel made from recycled materials?​ No, but we're working on it. Our primary goal was to provide a BPA-free product using a clear, durable material. Eastman Tritan™ was therefore the obvious choice for the vessel body. But while Tritan is fully recyclable, it is so new that it is not currently available in recycled form. As the market for Tritan matures, we expect this will change.

In addition to Tritan, the side, top and bottom trims of the KOR ONE are made from ABS plastic. Recycled ABS is available, but we have not yet been able to find a supply that meets our requirements for color consistency and structural integrity. We continue to evaluate both recycled ABS and other recycled plastics and hope to someday offer a "recycled" KOR vessel that utilizes recycled materials for the trim parts.
What certifications do you have?​ KOR is working with labs that will independently certify the filter at NSF-42 as well as testing the water for presence of any harmful additives.
Is the KOR+ vessel unbreakable? No. While made with durable materials and high quality manufacturing techniques, KOR Hydration Vessels are sophisticated pieces of engineering and are not intended for extreme physical conditions such as hiking or camping. When cared for properly, any KOR vessel will provide years of pleasurable and practical use.
Are there any risks associated with use? Our research and extensive vetting has shown KOR+ and its properties to be of little risk.


When does shipping begin? December 2017
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps? We expect most KOR+ packages to be delivered in December 2017, but this is largely dependent on where you live.  
Where does it ship? Globally
How much is shipping? Shipping to the US is free. Other countries have varied shipping prices. Please see your selected perk for details.
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? Yes

 

Is there a warranty? Lifetime free replacement for subscribers
What is your refund policy? Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.
What is your return / exchange policy? If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.
How do I upgrade my pre-order to a better one? Email KOR via your Indiegogo account and a customer service representative will assist you
Why do I have to wait longer than usual? This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the KOR+ vessel, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.
If I have other questions, who should I contact? customercare@korwater.com

 

What is hydrogen water? Hydrogen water is water to which hydrogen gas (H2) has been added. Hydrogen gas, also known as molecular hydrogen, has been shown to have strong antioxidant properties.
What is an antioxidant? Antioxidants are organic substances found in foods and beverages. These power-house substances help you fight damage to your body’s cells caused by the process of oxidation.
What is oxidation? Oxidation, sometimes called oxidative stress, is completely normal; however, it produces highly unstable and potentially harmful molecules called free radicals. Oxidation happens every day through normal activities, but it can be exacerbated by stress, lack of sleep, poor diet, smoking, anxiety and even pollution in the air. Oxidation is like rust in the body. It eats away at healthy cells
What is a free radical? Free radicals are created through oxidation and are molecular fragments that are short one electron. We all create free radicals on a consistent basis.
How do free radicals affect my body? The formation of free radicals is completely normal and in some cases can actually have positive effects on the body. However, at high concentration levels, they can be harmful, potentially wreaking havoc on your cells, including DNA, proteins and cell membranes. Since free radicals are missing an electron, they scour your body trying to combine with healthy cells to steal an electron. The process sets off a chain reaction that can damage healthy cells and weaken your immune system.
What kind of damage can free radicals do to my body? Free radicals have been identified as a cause of many different degenerative processes in the body, including aging, memory degeneration, learning capacity, coordination and may even contribute to some diseases: cancer, heart disease, chronic inflammation and other neurological disorders.
How do antioxidants like molecular hydrogen neutralize free radicals? As we age, our ability to fight off free radicals diminishes rapidly. Antioxidants are effective in battling this degeneration. Antioxidants, like molecular hydrogen, can benefit you in one of two ways. They can give one of their electrons to a free radical. Once a free radical finds an electron, it no longer needs to attack healthy cells. Another way antioxidants help fight free radicals is by going on the offensive and breaking down the free radical molecule, inhibiting its ability to attack healthy cells.
Is this backed by science? Over 600 studies have been conducted on the benefits of hydrogen water. The studies cover multiple topics pertaining to oxidative stress and its effects on the body
How is KOR+ different from other hydrogen water products? KOR+ is the first bottle/filter combination that creates hydrogen water on demand without electrolysis. This on-demand feature helps maximize your intake of molecular hydrogen while you’re on the go. No outlets needed. KOR+ also has low environmental impact. Most hydrogen water products are single use water packets, creating more waste. In contrast, KOR+ is a reusable bottle with a filter that you only need to replace once per month.
How does molecular hydrogen combat oxidative stress and free radicals? Molecular hydrogen (H2) is a powerful antioxidant! Concentrated levels of H2 have been shown to bolster the mitochondrial wall in your cells, helping to protect it from degenerative free radicals. H2 is also able to lend its hydrogen molecule to neutralize free radicals. i.e. neutralizing oxidative stress in the body.
How does KOR+ create hydrogen water? The KOR+ bottle contains a filtration and enhancement component that we call the +capsule. Embedded within the +capsule is a proprietary blend of rare earth minerals. Drinking from the bottle causes water to pass through the +capsule, infusing it with hydrogen gas.

 

How does pH balanced water help me? KOR+ raises the pH of your water to an alkaline state, 9.5, which some have hypothesized has therapeutic effects; however, there is still research that needs to be done on alkaline to the same extent that scientists have performed studies involving molecular hydrogen.

 

What minerals are added to my hydrogen water? The KOR+ capsule also adds Magnesium, Calcium, Phosphorus & Sodium

The bottle is manufactured responsibly in China and the filter is manufactured in South Korea.

 

What does it do?
The KOR+ App will calculate your KOR+ goal, coach you through a 30 day challenge, and track your daily KOR+ consumption. 


What is a KOR+ goal?
Your KOR+ goal is the recommended amount of water you should be drinking based on your personal inputs to maximize potential health benefits. 


What is the 30 Day Challenge? 
The app can coach you through a 30 day challenge to help you develop a healthy hydration habit. Additionally, it will measure your health progress throughout and display it on a personal dashboard for easy access. 


What if I don't want to join the 30 Day Challenge?
No problem! You can use the app to track just your daily KOR+ intake and send you hydration reminders. 


How will the app make sure I stay hydrated?
The app has a dynamic bottle that you can adjust to reflect your KOR+ intake for the day, give you updates on how close you are to your goal, and provide an option for reminders. 



How do I set it up?
1. Detach straw from bottle. Remove filter from packet. Rinse filter in water for 30 seconds. 2. Insert filter into lid base with rubber plug facing DOWN (do NOT remove the plug). 3. Reattach straw to lid.4. Reattach lid to bottle.5. Press button of lid to open and enjoy (tilting of bottle not necessary — simply sip like a straw).


How do I clean and care for my KOR+ bottle?
Detach the straw and remove the filter. Put the filter in to the KOR+ Capsule storage unit while you wash your bottle.The KOR+ is a hand-wash only bottle. Use a soft bristle brush to clean the sides with warm, soapy water. If needed, use a small bristled brush to clean out the straw's mouthpiece.


Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable?
KOR+ and the KOR+ lid are both machine washable. Remove your KOR+ capsule before washing your bottle!


How do I clean my KOR+?
Daily washing of your bottle is necessary, since our mouths naturally harbor bacteria, it is highly recommended that you do wash your vessel daily.


How do I store my filter while cleaning my bottle?​
KOR+ ships with a KOR+ Capsule storage vessel for safe keeping while you wash your bottle.


When do I change the filter​?
Change your filter 1x/Month. Change on the 1st of every month


Is KOR+ safe to use outside the U.S.?
KOR+ was designed for use with potable water only. It will not remove harmful microbes, such as Giardia, which may be present in the tap water of some countries. We recommend only using KOR+ with potable tap water in the following areas: US, Europe, Japan, Canada, Australia and New Zealand. Nevertheless we encourage you to ensure your water meets the equivalent or better of potable water in the U.S. for which the KOR+ was tested.


Can I take my KOR+ to high altitudes, such as on an airplane or to the mountains? What happens if I leave my KOR+ in my car in warmer climates?
We encourage you to bring KOR+ wherever you go! Just note that altitude or heat can cause pressure to build up in KOR+, which will cause water to spurt from the mouthpiece when the cap is opened. To prevent this, twist the lid open about a quarter turn to release the pressure. Then tighten the lid back on, sip and enjoy! (This reaction is quite common in closed containers such as lotion bottles, snack bags and other straw-based reusable water bottles).


Can I pour filtered water from the KOR+ into a glass or a bowl for my dog if I tip it upside down?​
No, because KOR+ is designed not to leak when held upside down.


Can I drink juice, Gatorade or other flavored beverages from the KOR+?​
If you want to drink flavored beverages, just remove the filter and the KOR+ will work fine. Otherwise, you might ruin the filter and/or cause your beverage to taste bad.


Will the KOR+ function without the filter in place?​
Yes, it will work fine. However, due to the large volume of the empty filter chamber, it will take somewhat longer to get water into your mouth on the first sip. After that, the KOR+ air-tight seal will keep the chamber filled and you won't notice anything unusual on subsequent sips (unless you open the bottle which breaks the seal).


What happens if my filter freezes?
We don’t recommend freezing a moist filter because the water will expand when frozen, which may lead to breakage. Therefore you should inspect the filter. If it isn’t cracked or broken, it will still function.



What are the recommend ages?
All ages


Where can I use it?
Everywhere you go!


Is it safe?
KOR+'s activated carbon filter is made from coconut shells, which are widely recognized as the most effective material for carbon filtration. After harvesting, the shells are converted to activated carbon using a proprietary process that minimizes greenhouse gas emissions. Unlike coal, which takes millions of years to form and may contain heavy metals, coconut is a renewable and health-safe resource. The rare earth mineral blend is a proprietary blend of minerals that occur naturally and are safe for ingestion.


Is the bottle BPA Free?​
YES! As a company, we place the utmost priority on the health safety of our products. While there is still debate over the health impact of BPA, we didn't want to leave anything to chance. That's why none of our products contain BPA.


What is activated carbon?
Activated carbon has been used for thousands of years to purify water. Here's why: In its natural state, carbon has a strong affinity for absorbing organic compounds such as chlorine and benzine. Activated carbon is simply a form of carbon that has been processed under high heat to become extremely porous (in fact, a teaspoon of activated carbon has the roughly the surface area of a football field). Combined with carbon's natural absorptive properties, all that surface area enables a tremendous amount of absorption when water passes through the filter.


Is the KOR+ filter compostable/biodegradable?​
No. This is because the coconut carbon in the filter is held together with a small amount of polyethylene binder. Otherwise it would disintegrate quickly. We are investigating ways of making the binder from a biodegradable material and hope to make a compostable version of the filter someday soon.


What do you mean about your filter being "sustainably manufactured"?​
Activated carbon is manufactured by heating organic materials to very high temperatures. This typically results in a large release of greenhouse gasses. Our supplier uses a proprietary process that reduces emissions by trapping greenhouse gasses and reusing them to produce thermal energy.


Is my KOR vessel made from recycled materials?​
No, but we're working on it. Our primary goal was to provide a BPA-free product using a clear, durable material. Eastman Tritan™ was therefore the obvious choice for the vessel body. But while Tritan is fully recyclable, it is so new that it is not currently available in recycled form. As the market for Tritan matures, we expect this will change.In addition to Tritan, the side, top and bottom trims of the KOR ONE are made from ABS plastic. Recycled ABS is available, but we have not yet been able to find a supply that meets our requirements for color consistency and structural integrity. We continue to evaluate both recycled ABS and other recycled plastics and hope to someday offer a "recycled" KOR vessel that utilizes recycled materials for the trim parts.


What certifications do you have?​
KOR is working with labs that will independently certify the filter at NSF-42 as well as testing the water for presence of any harmful additives.


Is the KOR+ vessel unbreakable?
No. While made with durable materials and high quality manufacturing techniques, KOR Hydration Vessels are sophisticated pieces of engineering and are not intended for extreme physical conditions such as hiking or camping. When cared for properly, any KOR vessel will provide years of pleasurable and practical use.


Are there any risks associated with use?
Our research and extensive vetting has shown KOR+ and its properties to be of little risk.



When does shipping begin?
December 2017


When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?
We expect most KOR+ packages to be delivered in December 2017, but this is largely dependent on where you live.  


Where does it ship?
Globally


How much is shipping?
Shipping to the US is free. Other countries have varied shipping prices. Please see your selected perk for details.


Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
Yes

 

Is there a warranty?
Lifetime free replacement for subscribers


What is your refund policy?
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.


What is your return / exchange policy?
If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.


How can I check the status of my pre-order?
By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.


How do I upgrade my pre-order to a better one?
Email KOR via your Indiegogo account and a customer service representative will assist you


Why do I have to wait longer than usual?
This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the KOR+ vessel, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?
customercare@korwater.com

 

What is hydrogen water?
Hydrogen water is water to which hydrogen gas (H2) has been added. Hydrogen gas, also known as molecular hydrogen, has been shown to have strong antioxidant properties.


What is an antioxidant?
Antioxidants are organic substances found in foods and beverages. These power-house substances help you fight damage to your body’s cells caused by the process of oxidation.


What is oxidation?
Oxidation, sometimes called oxidative stress, is completely normal; however, it produces highly unstable and potentially harmful molecules called free radicals. Oxidation happens every day through normal activities, but it can be exacerbated by stress, lack of sleep, poor diet, smoking, anxiety and even pollution in the air. Oxidation is like rust in the body. It eats away at healthy cells


What is a free radical?
Free radicals are created through oxidation and are molecular fragments that are short one electron. We all create free radicals on a consistent basis.


How do free radicals affect my body?
The formation of free radicals is completely normal and in some cases can actually have positive effects on the body. However, at high concentration levels, they can be harmful, potentially wreaking havoc on your cells, including DNA, proteins and cell membranes. Since free radicals are missing an electron, they scour your body trying to combine with healthy cells to steal an electron. The process sets off a chain reaction that can damage healthy cells and weaken your immune system.


What kind of damage can free radicals do to my body?
Free radicals have been identified as a cause of many different degenerative processes in the body, including aging, memory degeneration, learning capacity, coordination and may even contribute to some diseases: cancer, heart disease, chronic inflammation and other neurological disorders.


How do antioxidants like molecular hydrogen neutralize free radicals?
As we age, our ability to fight off free radicals diminishes rapidly. Antioxidants are effective in battling this degeneration. Antioxidants, like molecular hydrogen, can benefit you in one of two ways. They can give one of their electrons to a free radical. Once a free radical finds an electron, it no longer needs to attack healthy cells. Another way antioxidants help fight free radicals is by going on the offensive and breaking down the free radical molecule, inhibiting its ability to attack healthy cells.


Is this backed by science?
Over 600 studies have been conducted on the benefits of hydrogen water. The studies cover multiple topics pertaining to oxidative stress and its effects on the body


How is KOR+ different from other hydrogen water products?
KOR+ is the first bottle/filter combination that creates hydrogen water on demand without electrolysis. This on-demand feature helps maximize your intake of molecular hydrogen while you’re on the go. No outlets needed. KOR+ also has low environmental impact. Most hydrogen water products are single use water packets, creating more waste. In contrast, KOR+ is a reusable bottle with a filter that you only need to replace once per month.


How does molecular hydrogen combat oxidative stress and free radicals?
Molecular hydrogen (H2) is a powerful antioxidant! Concentrated levels of H2 have been shown to bolster the mitochondrial wall in your cells, helping to protect it from degenerative free radicals. H2 is also able to lend its hydrogen molecule to neutralize free radicals. i.e. neutralizing oxidative stress in the body.


How does KOR+ create hydrogen water?
The KOR+ bottle contains a filtration and enhancement component that we call the +capsule. Embedded within the +capsule is a proprietary blend of rare earth minerals. Drinking from the bottle causes water to pass through the +capsule, infusing it with hydrogen gas.

 
How does pH balanced water help me?
KOR+ raises the pH of your water to an alkaline state, 9.5, which some have hypothesized has therapeutic effects; however, there is still research that needs to be done on alkaline to the same extent that scientists have performed studies involving molecular hydrogen.
 
What minerals are added to my hydrogen water?
The KOR+ capsule also adds Magnesium, Calcium, Phosphorus & Sodium

story:
Our Story 

We are a family-owned business. We founded our company in 2016. Within our team, we have a variety of powerful professional contributors that brings their experience, knowledge, and love. From women entrepreneurs, professional hairstylists, and the voice of the consumers.

We found it overwhelmed for people to find the right products for their hair. That is the reason why every Cliove product goes through an extensive formulation process, from the selection of powerful certified organic ingredients from sustainable sources, Argan, Coconut and Olive Oils carefully calibrating them into the perfect blend, testing the technology with scientist and professional hairdressers, to customizing the formulas with a perfect elegant fragrance signature that will help to heal your hair and scalp. 

 Cliove uses Natural ingredients in our products both oils and plant extract in order to restore and maintain your hair’s healthy glow from within. 

*Watch the video below to know us better(we wanted to pitch  to you first - Cute and funny)

 

​

​

     

    OUR PERKS

     

    Cliove Organics cater to all hair types and conditions.

     

    1 of each Keratin Shampoo & Conditioner Perk.

    With this Duo, you will get 1 of each Anti-Frizz Keratin Protein Shampoo & Conditioners 12oz.  Cliove shampoo and conditioner will balance your hair oil level since it has adaptogen properties whether you have dry hair or oily hair. This set will maintain and enhance your Keratin or Brazilian treatments, will maintain your color-treated hair, promote hair growth, and prevent hair loss. Overall you will enjoy extra shiny hair and incredible smell. 

    Cliove Keratin Protein Shampoo cleanses hair while nourishing the roots and reducing frizz. Formulated with protein, making it ideal for everyday use.

    Direction: Use a generous amount and apply it to hair twice. Massage hair for 1-2 minutes each time, follow using Anti-Frizz conditioner or Protein Hair Masque.

    Cliove Keratin Protein Conditioner  Restores moisture to damaged hair while reducing frizz and nourishing the cuticle. Aids hair in regaining shine and restoring the health of the hair naturally.

    Directions: Apply on wet hair after the use of Anti-Frizz Shampoo; use fingertips to massage hair. For optimum post-care results, apply Hair Styling Cream and Hair Serum-Oil. 

    Read products ingredients list here

    Regardless of what Indiegogo message in Checkout. Products are already in stock and guarantee to be shipped and deliver right after backing our project. FREE SHIPPING!

    Imperial Purple Shampoo & Conditioner Perk

    With this Duo, you will get 1 of each Purple Shampoo & Conditioners 12oz.  The unique color-correcting formula preserves cool platinum blondes and silver foxes' hair tunes. full of rich nutrients and soothing botanical extracts to promote healthy hair from the start.  

    Cliove Purple Shampoo is Provides color-neutralizing and nourishing benefits to lighter hair tones, Extra-mild formula gently cleanses and smooths the cuticle, Cool violet pigments help to brighten and/or enhance blonde, gray or white hair while neutralizing yellow tones, Removes brassiness caused by natural factors such as the environment, discoloration or sun exposure, Restores vibrancy to blonde and highlighted hair Hydrates and adds shine, Improves humidity resistance. 

    Directions: Wet hair, lather shampoo in palms, massage throughout hair. Rinse completely. Follow with Bright Conditioner to maintain the vibrancy of color. 

     Cliove Purple Conditioner Provides color-neutralizing and nourishing benefits to lighter hair tones, Deeply restores moisture and maintains the brilliance and shine of color while keeping hair healthy, Removes brassiness caused by natural factors such as the environment, discoloration or sun exposure, Detangles and improves manageability Protects and helps prevent split ends Improves moisture, strength, and shine Improves humidity resistance. 

    Directions: Apply a small amount to hair after Bright Shampoo. Comb through and leave for 3-5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. 

    Read products ingredients list here

    Regardless of what Indiegogo message in Checkout. Products are already in stock and guarantee to be shipped and deliver right after backing our project. FREE SHIPPING!

     

    Protein Conditioning Kit Perk

    Deep conditioning includes 3 products, The Hair Mask will condition your hair while the styling cream will aid blow drying and the hair serum will add you the extra shine for a finished look. This system will treat your hair and scalp. Products already in stock and guarantee to be shipped and deliver right after backing our project.

    Cliove Hair Protein Mask in An intense conditioner used to prevent hair breakage And replenish hair’s moister and shine, perfect for Regular use or to preserve a Keratin treatment.

    Direction: After shampoo. Apply Hair Masque liberally; use your fingertips to massage the hair thoroughly. Process for 5 minutes and rinse with warm water to seal in the cuticle.

    Cliove Advance Styling Cream Used to effectively hydrate the hair while improving elasticity. Heat-activated formulation seals-in shine and creates smoothness during the process of blow-drying.

    Direction: After shampoo, towel dry hair. Apply using your fingertips. Use before blow-dry to protect from heat, speed up drying time, and control frizz.

    Cliove Hair Serum Drops is Ultra-light, the non-greasy formula infuses natural Olive Oil deep into the cuticle adding shine and Restoring sleekness for all hair types.

    Direction: After blow-drying or thermal ironing, apply a dime-sized amount of serum to your palms. Rub both palms together and apply on the ends first, moving to the mid-shaft, and finally finishing at the crown to control flyaways.

    Read products ingredients list here

    Regardless of what Indiegogo message in Checkout. Products are already in stock and guarantee to be shipped and deliver right after backing our project. FREE SHIPPING!

     

     

    Keratin Anti-Frizz Hair Care Kit Perk

    Cliove Anti-Frizz Hair Care Bundle includes 5 items. Keratin Protein Shampoo and Conditioner,  Advance Styling Cream, Hair Serum, and Deep Conditioner Protein Hair Mask, Help Protect, Repair, and Reduce Dryness for all hair types. Its the complete package to all your hair and scalp needs.

    Cliove shampoo and conditioner will balance your hair oil level since it has adaptogen properties whether you have dry hair or oily hair. This set will maintain and enhance your Keratin or Brazilian treatments, will maintain your color-treated hair, promote hair growth, and prevent hair loss. Overall you will enjoy extra shiny hair and incredible smell. 

    Cliove Keratin Protein Shampoo cleanses hair while nourishing the roots and reducing frizz. Formulated with protein, making it ideal for everyday use.

    Direction: Use a generous amount and apply it to hair twice. Massage hair for 1-2 minutes each time, follow using Anti-Frizz conditioner or Protein Hair Masque.

    Cliove Keratin Protein Conditioner  Restores moisture to damaged hair while reducing frizz and nourishing the cuticle. Aids hair in regaining shine and restoring the health of the hair naturally.

    Directions: Apply on wet hair after the use of Anti-Frizz Shampoo; use fingertips to massage hair. For optimum post-care results, apply Hair Styling Cream and Hair Serum-Oil. 

    Cliove Hair Protein Mask in An intense conditioner used to prevent hair breakage And replenish hair’s moister and shine, perfect for Regular use or to preserve a Keratin treatment.

    Direction: After shampoo. Apply Hair Masque liberally; use your fingertips to massage the hair thoroughly. Process for 5 minutes and rinse with warm water to seal in the cuticle.

    Cliove Advance Styling Cream Used to effectively hydrate the hair while improving elasticity. Heat-activated formulation seals-in shine and creates smoothness during the process of blow-drying.

    Direction: After shampoo, towel dry hair. Apply using your fingertips. Use before blow-dry to protect from heat, speed up drying time, and control frizz.

    Cliove Hair Serum Drops is Ultra-light, the non-greasy formula infuses natural Olive Oil deep into the cuticle adding shine and Restoring sleekness for all hair types.

    Direction: After blow-drying or thermal ironing, apply a dime-sized amount of serum to your palms. Rub both palms together and apply on the ends first, moving to the mid-shaft, and finally finishing at the crown to control flyaways.

    Read products ingredients list here

    Regardless of what Indiegogo message in Checkout. Products are already in stock and guarantee to be shipped and deliver right after backing our project. FREE SHIPPING!

    OUR ORGANIC OILS

    HOW CAN ORGANIC ARGAN OIL HELP YOUR HAIR?

    Argan oil is a great moisturizer and can be used to fight both dandruff and dry scalp because it’s extraordinarily high in vitamin E and antioxidants.

     

    HOW CAN COCONUT OIL HELP YOUR HAIR?

    Coconut oil is rich in vitamins c, and minerals and It has been in use as hair oil for thousands of years, and it has shown remarkable results in hair growth.

     

    HOW CAN OLIVE OIL HELP YOUR HAIR?

    Our Organic Olive oil imported from Israel is made up of components that soften and strengthen your hair, allowing it to be used for protection against heat, UV rays and more.  It moisturizes your ends, helping to prevent breakage and frizz. It helps moisturize the scalp and is also a good source of antioxidants, which removes damaging free-radicals from the external part of your hair follicle and scalp. The benefit of protecting the follicle is to prevent premature aging that causes hair loss.  

    By adding olive oil to hair treatments, it coats the outer layer of the hair, which makes it look smooth, shiny, healthy, and improves elasticity. A hidden gem that has been used for thousands of years.  

     

    Our History

     

     
    Testimonials From Correct Hair Salons and Distributors
     

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you cannot help contribute to our project here are a few things you could do:

      • Give us a shout out in your media channels. 
      • Provide us with an email list that might be interested in our project 
      • Tell about our project to your favorite hairstylist.

      And that's all there is to it.

Help fund training for medical staff and provide ambulances in Ethiopia!

Help fund our innovative home based healthcare service in Ethiopia

Did you know that there are very few home based care services in Ethiopia, no district nurses and no established community nursing?

There are few or no rehabilitation units or centres for people recuperating from illness and the prices of hospital stays are often expensive and carry the risk developing hospital borne infections. Hospital standards and costs are very variable and professional home healthcare is largely non-existent!

This can mean elderly parents are house or bed bound, vulnerable adults and children can be left alone at home and there are few professional services that offer care.

To combat these issues and to support high standards of home healthcare in Ethiopia Hirut Fisher last year started the Hospital @ Home service based in our Addis "London Clinic".  

Our founder, Hirut, has worked in nursing in the UK for 20 years and is a qualified Community Practice Educator, now dedicated to bringing that expertise to Addis Ababa, Ethopia with her home based healthcare service "Hospital at Home". 

Hirut is based in Addis Ababa and is passionate about offering professional home healthcare to the people of Ethiopia. We are pioneers in this field in Ethiopia. We believe that this service, commonly available in the West, should also be available in one of the poorest countries in the world.

Our service has been successfully running for 12 months. We plan to expand to cover a larger area and see more patients, to do this we need additional ambulances and more staff to effectively expand.

We need your donations to enable us to buy 2 x ambulances and employ and train another 8-10 specialist medical staff including senior nurses. Your donations will directly contribute to employment and professional training for up to a dozen individuals.

We have a program of specialist nurse training in home care and another program of health promotion for carers. 

The home base, however we largely work within patients home environments:

Our team...


Why are we asking for your help?

We’ve already treated 100’s of patients but we are asking for your help:

  • To purchase 2 additional ambulances that facilitate nurse and patient transport
  • So we can expand our services and treat more patients
  • We can expand our geographic area of coverage
  • We can fund the specialist training
  • We can fund additional staff.
  • We can support voluntary nurses from the UK and elsewhere who wish to share their knowledge and time with us.

The Impact of your donation

Your generous donation will go towards 2 ambulances (which double as nurse transport to patients, and patient transports to hospital where required). Our stretch goal if the fundraising target is exceeded is a further ambulance and staff! If our goal isn't reached we will be able to fund our expansion on a slower timescale.

We are fully licensed by the Ethiopian Ministry of Health and we provide paid employment for many nurses. We have already been in successful operation for one year, and your donation will help our expansion pick up speed.

Your donation will directly:

  • Facilitate the expansion of badly needed home based healthcare throughout Addis Ababa initially.
  • Directly help increase employment (often female) in our clinic
  • Offer high quality trained roles
  • Improve the quality of life for vulnerable patients
  • Bring innovative home based healthcare to Ethiopia

What services do we offer?

In Addis Ababa Hospital at Home provides everything from monitoring patient medication to complex long term illness and palliative (end of life) care in the home environment reducing hospital stays, medical costs and preventing hospital acquired infections. 

These services provide invaluable relief and care in distressing circumstances for patients and their families in one of the poorest countries in the world. There are financial, health and well being benefits of receiving treatment in a home environment and Hirut believes Ethiopians should have that choice.

We have a program of specialist nurse training in home care and another program of health promotion for carers.

These are some of the offered services:

  • Injections
  • Blood sugar and pressure monitoring
  • Wound and dressing changes
  • Bed sore treatment
  • Oxygen provision
  • Monitoring patient medication
  • Catheterisation
  • Individual programs of care based on patient need.
  • Bowel care
  • Pain management
  • Palliative care
  • Carer support and training etc

In fact we offer all the items a modern district (community) nurse would undertake in a Western country. The concept of professionally carrying out these services in patients homes is however relatively recent in Ethiopia, and not widely understood. Hirut's experience as a Practice Educator in the UK and her District Nursing experience is invaluable in this respect and any generous donations will enable her to apply her experience more effectively.

How can I help?

  • Donate! Every little helps, a few pounds (or dollars) will go a long long way in Ethiopia.
  • If you're unable to donate then please spread the word about our service and what we're trying to do. Share this Indiegogo site with others!

    • Perks!

    If you can donate we have some fantastic perks on offer, for instance the lovely hand made ethiopian scarves similar to below:

    And for larger donations a fantastic Ethiopian coffee pot and cup set similar to below.

    These are hand made individual items, so may not be identical to the images.


    Can I find out more?

    Find out more about our services at our clinical website: www.hospitalhome.net or our facebook site using the button at the bottom of this page and follow us on Twitter (@HospitalHome) where we'll be tweeting about our clinic and the progress of the fundraising!


    Finally...

    Thanks for taking the time to watch our video and read about our campaign. We are a transparent, open social enterprise thats 100% genuine. We don't stay in 4 star hotels, travel first class or have a fleet of 4x4's, we work hard, keep training and keep optimistic, we're close to the people we treat and we have a genuine connection to the people of Ethiopia. We're passionate about bringing the high standards of healthcare available in the advanced economies to one of the poorest countries in the world.. 

    We'd love to hear from you!

    If you wish to make some other type of donation and\or discuss partnering or are a qualified nurse and could work for a time as a volunteer in our operation we would like to hear from you directly please call +447968 189586.

    Thanks to all our friends and colleauges who've helped us so far, helped us with our videos, come to our coffee mornings and provided valuable input, its truly appreciated.

story:
Short Summary

Health care costs have become ridiculous!!!  The government can't fix it and neither can the insurance companies.  We believe our model can help keep personal healthcare costs low enough that even people without insurance can get the X-Rays they need.    We believe that through partnering with a network of independent doctors and providers to provide services for uninsured patients at affordable rates, and insured patients at a discounted rate as well, we can make a portion of healthcare affordable.  

My name is Johnny Crain, and my business partner is Anita Torrez.  We both went to X-Ray school to help people.  After working in hospitals and government health facilities we knew there was a better way.  A better way to impact peoples lives, a better way to use our skills to benefit society as a whole and a better way to provide imaging services.  

What We Need & What You Get

We would love to raise millions of dollars, but the reality is that we need start up money to pay the bills while our client base grows.  The $25000 will cover all operating costs for the next 6 months while we focus on our customers.  

What truly makes us unique is that we are looking to bring high quality medical care to rural communities around New Mexico and expanding to other southwest states.  People who contribute to our organization have a direct impact on the lives of people who may not be able to afford the best healthcare- but still deserve high quality healthcare nonetheless.  

Even if we do not reach our funding goal, the money will ALL be used to keep the lights on while we reach sustainability. 

The Impact

What truly makes us unique is that we are looking to bring high quality medical care to rural communities around the U.S.  People who contribute to our organization have a direct impact on the lives of people who may not be able to afford the best healthcare- but still deserve high quality healthcare nonetheless. 

    Risks & Challenges

    Obstacles in healthcare are many; from lawsuits to which providers to contract with and what services to offer.  With insurance in place and top quality doctors to assist with referring patients, we can grow and reach a healthy operation.  The biggest challenge is focusing wholeheartedly on this business while working full time and support a fledgling company.  Overcoming the challenge of splitting our time between two full time jobs each is overwhelming to say the least.    

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you can't contribute- please forward our campaign to someone without health insurance that may benefit from a company like ours in the future!!!  Get the word out with us!!!  JCAT Imaging Services can help make "Affordable Health Care" a reality, not just a SNL skit!!!


      Use the indiegogo tools to share!!!!
